title: 1 Chronicles 1:1
content: 1 Adam, Seth, Enosh,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:2
content: 2 Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:3
content: 3 Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:4
content: 4 Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:5
content: 5 The sons of Japheth: Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshek, and Tiras.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:6
content: 6 And the sons of Gomer: Ashkenaz, and Diphath, and Togarmah.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:7
content: 7 And the sons of Javan: Elishah, and Tarshish, the Kittites, and the Rodanites.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:8
content: 8 The sons of Ham: Cush and Egypt, Put and Canaan.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:9
content: 9 And the sons of Cush: Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabteka. And the sons of Raamah: Sheba and Dedan.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:10
content: 10 And Cush fathered Nimrod; he began to be a mighty one on the earth.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:11
content: 11 And Egypt fathered the Ludites, and the Anamites, and the Lehabites, and the Naphtuhites,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:12
content: 12 and the Pathrusites, and the Kasluhites (from whom the Philistines came), and the Caphtorites.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:13
content: 13 And Canaan fathered Sidon, his firstborn, and Heth,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:14
content: 14 and the Jebusites, and the Amorites, and the Girgashites,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:15
content: 15 and the Hivites, and the Arkites, and the Sinites,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:16
content: 16 and the Arvadites, and the Zemarites, and the Hamathites.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:17
content: 17 The sons of Shem: Elam, and Ashur, and Arpachshad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshek.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:18
content: 18 And Arpachshad fathered Shelah, and Shelah fathered Eber.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:19
content: 19 And to Eber were born two sons. The name of the one, Peleg, for in his days the earth was divided. And the name of his brother, Joktan.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:20
content: 20 And Joktan fathered Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:21
content: 21 and Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:22
content: 22 and Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:23
content: 23 and Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab; all these, the sons of Joktan.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:24
content: 24 Shem, Arpachshad, Shelah,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:25
content: 25 Eber, Peleg, Reu,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:26
content: 26 Serug, Nahor, Terah,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:27
content: 27 Abram, that is, Abraham.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:28
content: 28 The sons of Abraham: Isaac and Ishmael.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:29
content: 29 These, their generations: the firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:30
content: 30 Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:31
content: 31 Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These were the sons of Ishmael.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:32
content: 32 And the sons of Keturah, the concubine of Abraham: she bore Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan: Sheba and Dedan.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:33
content: 33 And the sons of Midian: Ephah, and Epher, and Hanok, and Abida, and Eldaah; all these, the sons of Keturah.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:34
content: 34 And Abraham fathered Isaac. The sons of Isaac: Esau and Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:35
content: 35 The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jalam, and Korah.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:36
content: 36 The sons of Eliphaz: Teman, and Omar, Zepho, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:37
content: 37 The sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:38
content: 38 And the sons of Seir: Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:39
content: 39 And the sons of Lotan: Hori and Homam. And the sister of Lotan: Timna.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:40
content: 40 The sons of Shobal: Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon: Aiah and Anah.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:41
content: 41 The sons of Anah: Dishon. And the sons of Dishon: Hemdan, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Keran.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:42
content: 42 The sons of Ezer: Bilhan, and Zaavan, and Akan. The sons of Dishan: Uz and Aran.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:43
content: 43 And these, the kings who reigned in the land of Edom before the face of a king reigned over the sons of Israel: Bela, son of Beor. And the name of his city: Dinhabah.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:44
content: 44 And Bela died, and Jobab son of Zerah from Bozrah reigned in his place.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:45
content: 45 And Jobab died, and Husham from the land of the Temanites reigned in his place.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:46
content: 46 And Husham died, and Hadad son of Bedad, who struck down Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his place. And the name of his city: Avith.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:47
content: 47 And Hadad died, and Samlah from Masrekah reigned in his place.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:48
content: 48 And Samlah died, and Shaul from Rehoboth of the river reigned in his place.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:49
content: 49 And Shaul died, and Baal-Hanan son of Akbor reigned in his place.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:50
content: 50 And Baal-Hanan died, and Hadad reigned in his place. And the name of his city: Pai. And the name of his wife: Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Me-Zahab.

title: 1 Chronicles 1:51
content: 51 And Hadad died. And the chiefs of Edom were Chief Timna, Chief Alvah, Chief Jetheth,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:52
content: 52 Chief Oholibamah, Chief Elah, Chief Pinon,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:53
content: 53 Chief Kenaz, Chief Teman, Chief Mibzar,

title: 1 Chronicles 1:54
content: 54 Chief Magdiel, Chief Iram. These, the chiefs of Edom.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:1
content: 1 These were the sons of Israel: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,

title: 1 Chronicles 2:2
content: 2 Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:3
content: 3 The sons of Judah: Er, and Onan, and Shelah; three were born to him by Bath-shua the Canaanite. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was wicked in the eyes of Yahweh, and he killed him.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:4
content: 4 And Tamar, his daughter-in-law, bore to him Perez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah, five.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:5
content: 5 The sons of Perez: Hezron and Hamul.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:6
content: 6 And the sons of Zerah: Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Kalkol, and Dara. All of them, five.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:7
content: 7 And the sons of Karmi: Achar, the troubler of Israel who violated the ban.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:8
content: 8 And the sons of Ethan: Azariah.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:9
content: 9 And the sons of Hezron who were born to him: Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Caleb.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:10
content: 10 And Ram fathered Amminadab, and Amminadab fathered Nahshon, leader of the sons of Judah.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:11
content: 11 And Nahshon fathered Salmon, and Salmon fathered Boaz.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:12
content: 12 And Boaz fathered Obed, and Obed fathered Jesse.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:13
content: 13 And Jesse fathered his firstborn, Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimea the third,

title: 1 Chronicles 2:14
content: 14 Nethanel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,

title: 1 Chronicles 2:15
content: 15 Ozem the sixth, David the seventh,

title: 1 Chronicles 2:16
content: 16 and their sisters: Zeruiah and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah: Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:17
content: 17 And Abigail bore Amasa, and the father of Amasa: Jether the Ishmaelite.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:18
content: 18 And Caleb son of Hezron had children with Azubah, a wife, and with Jerioth. And these, her sons: Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:19
content: 19 And Azubah died, and Caleb took for himself Ephrath. And she bore to him Hur.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:20
content: 20 And Hur fathered Uri, and Uri fathered Bezalel.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:21
content: 21 And afterward Hezron went into the daughter of Makir the father of Gilead, and he took her. And he was a son of 60 years. And she bore to him Segub.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:22
content: 22 And Segub fathered Jair. And there were to him 23 cities in the land of Gilead.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:23
content: 23 And Geshur and Aram took from them Havvoth-Jair, Kenath, and its daughters, 60 towns. All these, the sons of Makir, the father of Gilead.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:24
content: 24 And after the death of Hezron in Caleb Ephrathah, then the wife of Hezron, Abijah, then she bore to him Ashhur, the father of Tekoa.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:25
content: 25 And the sons of Jerahmeel, the firstborn of Hezron, were the firstborn Ram, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, Ahijah.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:26
content: 26 And there was another wife of Jerahmeel, and her name, Atarah. She, the mother of Onam.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:27
content: 27 And the sons of Ram, the firstborn of Jerahmeel, were Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:28
content: 28 And the sons of Onam were Shammai and Jada. And the sons of Shammai: Nadab and Abishur.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:29
content: 29 And the name of the wife of Abishur: Abihail. And she bore to him Ahban and Molid.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:30
content: 30 And the sons of Nadab: Seled and Appaim. And Seled died without sons.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:31
content: 31 And the sons of Appaim: Ishi. And the sons of Ishi: Sheshan. And the sons of Sheshan: Ahlai.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:32
content: 32 And the sons of Jada, the brother of Shammai: Jether and Jonathan. And Jether died without sons.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:33
content: 33 And the sons of Jonathan: Peleth and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:34
content: 34 And there were not to Sheshan sons, but only daughters. And to Sheshan a servant, an Egyptian, and his name, Jarha.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:35
content: 35 And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant for a wife. And she bore to him Attai.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:36
content: 36 And Attai fathered Nathan, and Nathan fathered Zabad.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:37
content: 37 And Zabad fathered Ephlal, and Ephlal fathered Obed.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:38
content: 38 And Obed fathered Jehu, and Jehu fathered Azariah.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:39
content: 39 And Azariah fathered Helez, and Helez fathered Eleasah.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:40
content: 40 And Eleasah fathered Sismai, and Sismai fathered Shallum.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:41
content: 41 And Shallum fathered Jekamiah, and Jekamiah fathered Elishama.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:42
content: 42 And the sons of Caleb, the brother of Jerahmeel: Mesha his firstborn; he, the father of Ziph. And the sons of Mareshah, the father of Hebron.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:43
content: 43 And the sons of Hebron: Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:44
content: 44 And Shema fathered Raham, the father of Jorkeam. And Rekem fathered Shammai.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:45
content: 45 And the son of Shammai: Maon, and Maon the father of Beth Zur.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:46
content: 46 And Ephah, the concubine of Caleb, bore Haran, and Moza, and Gazez. And Haran fathered Gazez.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:47
content: 47 And the sons of Jahdai: Regem, and Jotham, and Geshan, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:48
content: 48 The concubine of Caleb, Maakah, bore Sheber and Tirhanah.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:49
content: 49 And she bore Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Makbenah and the father of Gibea. And the daughter of Caleb, Aksah.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:50
content: 50 These were the sons of Caleb. The son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephrathah: Shobal the father of Kiriath Jearim,

title: 1 Chronicles 2:51
content: 51 Salma the father of Bethlehem, Hareph the father of Beth Gader.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:52
content: 52 And the sons of Shobal, the father of Kiriath Jearim, were Haroeh, half of the Menuhoth,

title: 1 Chronicles 2:53
content: 53 and the clans of Kiriath Jearim: the Ithrites, and the Puthites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites. From these came the Zorathites and Eshtaolites.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:54
content: 54 The sons of Salma: Bethlehem, and the Netophathites, Atroth Beth Joab, and half of the Manahathites, the Zorites.

title: 1 Chronicles 2:55
content: 55 And the clans of the scribes lived at Jabez: the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and the Sucathites. These, the Kenites who came from Hammath, the father of the house of Rekab.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:1
content: 1 And these were the sons of David who were born to him in Hebron: the firstborn Amnon by Ahinoam the Jezreelite; the second Daniel by Abigail the Carmelite;

title: 1 Chronicles 3:2
content: 2 the third Absalom, the son of Maakah, the daughter of Talmai the king of Geshur; the fourth Adonijah, the son of Haggith;

title: 1 Chronicles 3:3
content: 3 the fifth Shephatiah by Abital; the sixth Ithream by Eglah, his wife.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:4
content: 4 Six were born to him in Hebron, and he reigned there seven years and six months. Then 33 years he reigned in Jerusalem.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:5
content: 5 And these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four by Bathshua, the daughter of Ammiel;

title: 1 Chronicles 3:6
content: 6 and Ibhar, and Elishua, and Eliphelet,

title: 1 Chronicles 3:7
content: 7 and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

title: 1 Chronicles 3:8
content: 8 and Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet; nine.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:9
content: 9 All the sons of David, besides sons of concubines, and Tamar their sister.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:10
content: 10 And the son of Solomon, Rehoboam; Abijah his son; Asa his son; Jehoshaphat his son;

title: 1 Chronicles 3:11
content: 11 Joram his son; Ahaziah his son; Joash his son;

title: 1 Chronicles 3:12
content: 12 Amaziah his son; Azariah his son; Jotham his son;

title: 1 Chronicles 3:13
content: 13 Ahaz his son; Hezekiah his son; Manasseh his son;

title: 1 Chronicles 3:14
content: 14 Amon his son; Josiah his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:15
content: 15 And the sons of Josiah: the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:16
content: 16 And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:17
content: 17 And the sons of Jeconiah, a prisoner: Shealtiel his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 3:18
content: 18 and Malkiram, and Pedaiah, and Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:19
content: 19 And the sons of Pedaiah: Zerubbabel and Shimei. And the son of Zerubbabel: Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister;

title: 1 Chronicles 3:20
content: 20 and Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berekiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab-Hesed, five.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:21
content: 21 And the son of Hananiah: Pelatiah and Jeshaiah. The sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shekaniah.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:22
content: 22 And the sons of Shekaniah: Shemaiah. And the sons of Shemaiah: Hattush, and Igal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:23
content: 23 And the son of Neariah: Elioenai, and Hizkiah, and Azrikam, three.

title: 1 Chronicles 3:24
content: 24 And the sons of Elioenai: Hodaviah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Delaiah, and Anani, seven.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:1
content: 1 The sons of Judah: Perez, Hezron, and Karmi, and Hur, and Shobal.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:2
content: 2 And Reaiah the son of Shobal fathered Jahath. And Jahath fathered Ahumai and Lahad. These, the clans of the Zorathites.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:3
content: 3 And these of the father Etam: Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash. And the name of their sister, Hazzelelponi.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:4
content: 4 And Penuel, the father of Gedor, and Ezer the father of Hushah; these, the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephrathah, the father of Bethlehem.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:5
content: 5 And to Ashhur the father of Tekoa were two wives, Helah and Naarah.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:6
content: 6 And Naarah bore to him Ahuzzam, and Hepher, and Temeni, and Haahashtari. These, the sons of Naarah.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:7
content: 7 And the sons of Helah: Zereth, and Zohar, and Ethnan.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:8
content: 8 And Koz fatherered Anub and Hazzobebah. And the clans of Aharhel, the son of Harum.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:9
content: 9 And Jabez was respected more than his brothers. And his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I bore in pain.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:10
content: 10 And Jabez called to the God of Israel, saying, Oh that you would surely bless me, and would enlarge my territory, and your hand would be with me, and you would act not in accordance with harm, so that I might not be in pain! And God brought about what he asked.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:11
content: 11 And Kelub, the brother of Shuhah, fathered Mehir; he, the father of Eshton.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:12
content: 12 And Eshton fathered Beth Rapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah, the father of Ir Nahash. These, the men of Rekah.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:13
content: 13 And the sons of Kenaz: Othniel and Seraiah. And the sons of Othniel: Hathath.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:14
content: 14 And Meonothai fathered Ophrah, and Seraiah fathered Joab, the father of Ge-Harashim, for craftsmen they were.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:15
content: 15 And the sons of Caleb, the son of Jephunneh: Iru, Elah, and Naam. And the sons of Elah: Kenaz.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:16
content: 16 And the sons of Jehallelel: Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asarel.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:17
content: 17 And the sons of Ezrah: Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon. And she conceived Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah, the father of Eshtemoa.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:18
content: 18 And his Judahite wife bore Jered the father of Gedor, and Heber the father of Soco, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah. And these, the sons of Bithiah the daughter of Pharaoh, whom Mered took.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:19
content: 19 And the sons of the wife of Hodiah, the sister of Naham, the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maakathite.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:20
content: 20 And the sons of Shimon: Amnon, and Rinnah, Ben-Hanan, and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi: Zoheth and Ben-Zoheth.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:21
content: 21 The sons of Shelah the son of Judah: Er the father of Lekah, and Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the clans of the house of the service of linen at Beth Ashbea,

title: 1 Chronicles 4:22
content: 22 and Jokim, and the men of Kozeba, and Joash and Saraph, who ruled in Moab and Jashubi Lehem. And the words are ancient.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:23
content: 23 These, the potters and inhabitants in Netaim and Gederah. With the king in his work, they lived there.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:24
content: 24 The sons of Simeon: Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, Shaul;

title: 1 Chronicles 4:25
content: 25 Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:26
content: 26 And the sons of Mishma: Hammuel his son; Zakkur his son; Shimei his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:27
content: 27 And to Shimei, 16 sons and six daughters; but to his brothers, not many sons, and all their clan did not multiply like the sons of Judah.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:28
content: 28 And they lived in Beersheba, and Moladah, and Hazar Shual,

title: 1 Chronicles 4:29
content: 29 and in Bilhah, and in Ezem, and in Tolad,

title: 1 Chronicles 4:30
content: 30 and in Bethuel, and in Hormah, and in Ziklag,

title: 1 Chronicles 4:31
content: 31 and in Beth Markaboth, and in Hazar Susim, and in Beth Biri, and in Shaaraim. These, their cities until the reign of David.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:32
content: 32 And their villages: Etam, and Ain, and Rimmon, and Token, and Ashan, five towns,

title: 1 Chronicles 4:33
content: 33 and all their villages which are around these towns as far as Baal. These, their settlements, and their genealogy was to them.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:34
content: 34 And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah the son of Amaziah,

title: 1 Chronicles 4:35
content: 35 and Joel, and Jehu the son of Joshibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,

title: 1 Chronicles 4:36
content: 36 and Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,

title: 1 Chronicles 4:37
content: 37 and Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:38
content: 38 These mentioned by name, leaders in their clans and the house of their fathers broke through into a multitude.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:39
content: 39 And they went to the entrance of Gedor, as far as to the east of the valley, to seek pasture for their flock.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:40
content: 40 And they found rich and good pasture, and the land was broad of hands, and quiet, and peaceful; for those from Ham had lived there before faces.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:41
content: 41 And these, written by names, came in the days of Hezekiah, the king of Judah, and struck down their tents and the Meunites, who were found there. And they destroyed them completely to this day, and they lived in their place because pasture for their flock was there.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:42
content: 42 And from them, from the sons of Simeon, they went to Mount Seir, 500 men, and Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi, their heads.

title: 1 Chronicles 4:43
content: 43 And they struck down the rest of the Amalekites who escaped, and they have lived there to this day.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:1
content: 1 And the sons of Reuben, the firstborn of Israel; for he was the firstborn, but when he defiled the bed of his father, his birthright was given to the sons of Joseph, the son of Israel, and not recorded according to the birthright,

title: 1 Chronicles 5:2
content: 2 though Judah was superior among his brothers, and a leader was from him, but the birthright was to Joseph

title: 1 Chronicles 5:3
content: 3 the sons of Reuben, the firstborn of Israel: Hanok, and Pallu, Hezron, and Karmi.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:4
content: 4 The sons of Joel: Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 5:5
content: 5 Micah his son, Reaiah his son, Baal his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 5:6
content: 6 Beerah his son, whom Tilgath-Pileser, the king of Assyria, took into exile. He was a leader of the Reubenites.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:7
content: 7 And his brothers by his clans in the genealogy of their generations: the head Jeiel, and Zechariah,

title: 1 Chronicles 5:8
content: 8 and Bela the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel; he lived in Aroer, and as far as Nebo and Baal Meon,

title: 1 Chronicles 5:9
content: 9 and to the east he lived as far as the entrance of the wilderness extending to the Euphrates River; for their livestock multiplied in the land of Gilead.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:10
content: 10 And in the days of Saul, they made war with the Hagrites and they fell into their hand. And they lived in their tents over all the face of the east of Gilead.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:11
content: 11 And the sons of Gad lived opposite them in the land of Bashan as far as Salekah:

title: 1 Chronicles 5:12
content: 12 Joel the head, and Shapham the second, and Janai, and Shaphat in Bashan.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:13
content: 13 And their brothers, according to the house of their fathers: Michael, and Meshullam, and Sheba, and Jorai, and Jakan, and Zia, and Eber, seven.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:14
content: 14 These, the sons of Abihail, the son of Huri, the son of Jaroah, the son of Gilead, the son of Michael, the son of Jeshisha, the son of Jahdo, the son of Buz.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:15
content: 15 Ahi, the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, head of the house of their fathers.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:16
content: 16 And they lived in Gilead, in Bashan, and in its daughters, and in all the pasturelands of Sharon as far as their borders.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:17
content: 17 All of them were listed in the genealogies in the days of Jotham, the king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam, the king of Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:18
content: 18 The sons of Reuben, and the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh from sons of strength, men who carried shield and sword, and who bent the bow, and who were trained in battle, 44,760 who went out to war.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:19
content: 19 And they made war with the Hagrites, and Jetur, and Naphish, and Nodab.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:20
content: 20 And they were helped against them, and the Hagrites were given into their hand and all who were with them. For they cried out to God in the battle, and he granted their entreaty because they trusted in him.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:21
content: 21 And they took captive their livestock: their camels 50,000, and sheep 250,000, and donkeys 2,000, and living people 100,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:22
content: 22 For many fell slain because the battle was from God. And they lived in their place until the exile.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:23
content: 23 And the sons of the half tribe of Manasseh lived in the land from Bashan as far as Baal Hermon and Senir, and Mount Hermon. They multiplied.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:24
content: 24 And these, the heads of the house of their fathers: even Epher, and Ishi, and Eliel, and Azriel, and Jeremiah, and Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, men mighty of strength, men of names, heads of the house of their fathers.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:25
content: 25 And they acted faithlessly against the God of their fathers, and they acted like a harlot after the gods of the peoples of the land whom God had destroyed before their faces.

title: 1 Chronicles 5:26
content: 26 And the God of Israel stirred up the spirit of Pul, the king of Assyria, and the spirit of Tilgath-Pileser, the king of Assyria. And he took them into exile, namely the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh. And he brought them to Halah, and Habor, and Hara, and the river of Gozan until this day.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:1
content: 1 The sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:2
content: 2 And the sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:3
content: 3 And the sons of Amram: Aaron, and Moses, and Miriam. And the sons of Aaron: Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:4
content: 4 Eleazar fathered Phinehas. Phinehas fathered Abishua.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:5
content: 5 And Abishua fathered Bukki, and Bukki fathered Uzzi.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:6
content: 6 And Uzzi fathered Zerahiah, and Zerahiah fathered Meraioth.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:7
content: 7 Meraioth fathered Amariah, and Amariah fathered Ahitub.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:8
content: 8 And Ahitub fathered Zadok, and Zadok fathered Ahimaaz.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:9
content: 9 And Ahimaaz fathered Azariah, and Azariah fathered Johanan.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:10
content: 10 And Johanan fathered Azariah, he who served as priest in the house that Solomon built in Jerusalem.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:11
content: 11 And Azariah fathered Amariah, and Amariah fathered Ahitub.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:12
content: 12 And Ahitub fathered Zadok, and Zadok fathered Shallum.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:13
content: 13 And Shallum fathered Hilkiah, and Hilkiah fathered Azariah.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:14
content: 14 And Azariah fathered Seraiah, and Seraiah fathered Jozadak.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:15
content: 15 And Jozadak went when Yahweh took into exile Judah and Jerusalem in the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:16
content: 16 The sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:17
content: 17 And these, the names of the sons of Gershon: Libni and Shimei.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:18
content: 18 And the sons of Kohath: Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:19
content: 19 The sons of Merari: Mahli and Mushi. And these, the clans of the Levites according to their fathers.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:20
content: 20 Of Gershom: Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:21
content: 21 Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeatherai his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:22
content: 22 The sons of Kohath: Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:23
content: 23 Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:24
content: 24 Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:25
content: 25 And the sons of Elkanah: Amasai, and Ahimoth,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:26
content: 26 Elkanah, his son Elkanah, Zophai his son, and Nahath his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:27
content: 27 Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:28
content: 28 And the sons of Samuel: the firstborn and the second, Abijah.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:29
content: 29 The sons of Merari: Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzzah his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:30
content: 30 Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:31
content: 31 And these whom David set up over hands of song in the house of Yahweh, after the Box came to rest.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:32
content: 32 And they were the ones ministering to the face of the tabernacle, the tent of meeting, with song until Solomon built the house of Yahweh in Jerusalem. And they stood according to their judgments over their service.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:33
content: 33 And these, the ones standing and their sons. From the sons of the Kohathites: Heman the singer, the son of Joel, the son of Samuel,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:34
content: 34 the son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:35
content: 35 the son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:36
content: 36 the son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:37
content: 37 the son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:38
content: 38 the son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:39
content: 39 And his brother Asaph who stood at his right hand, Asaph, the son of Berekiah, the son of Shimea,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:40
content: 40 the son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the son of Malkijah,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:41
content: 41 the son of Ethni, the son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:42
content: 42 the son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:43
content: 43 the son of Jahath, the son of Gershon, the son of Levi.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:44
content: 44 And the sons of Merari, their brothers, on the left: Ethan, the son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the son of Malluk,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:45
content: 45 the son of Hashabiah, the son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:46
content: 46 the son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shemer,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:47
content: 47 the son of Mahli, the son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:48
content: 48 And their brothers, the Levites, were set to all the service of the tabernacle of the house of God.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:49
content: 49 And Aaron and his sons made sacrifices on the altar of burnt offering and on the altar of incense for all the work of the Holy of Holies and to make atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:50
content: 50 And these, the sons of Aaron: Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:51
content: 51 Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:52
content: 52 Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:53
content: 53 Zadok his son, Ahimaaz his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:54
content: 54 And these, their dwellings according to their encampments in their borders. To the sons of Aaron, to the clans of the Kohathites, for to them was the lot.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:55
content: 55 And they gave to them Hebron in the land of Judah and its surrounding pasturelands,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:56
content: 56 but the field of the city and its villages, they gave to Caleb, the son of Jephunneh.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:57
content: 57 And to the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of refuge: Hebron, and Libnah and its pasturelands, and Jattir, and Eshtemoa and its pasturelands,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:58
content: 58 and Hilez and its pasturelands, Debir and its pasturelands,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:59
content: 59 and Ashan and its pasturelands, and Beth Shemesh and its pasturelands.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:60
content: 60 And from the tribe of Benjamin: Geba and its pasturelands, and Alemeth and its pasturelands, and Anathoth and its pasturelands. All their cities, 13 cities, among their clans.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:61
content: 61 And to the sons of Kohath remaining from the clan of the tribe, from the half tribe, the half of Manasseh, by lot, ten cities.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:62
content: 62 And to the sons of Gershom, for their clans, from the tribe of Issachar and from the tribe of Asher and from the tribe of Naphtali and from the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, 13 cities.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:63
content: 63 To the sons of Merari, for their clans, from the tribe of Reuben and from the tribe of Gad and from the tribe of Zebulun, by lot, 12 cities.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:64
content: 64 And the sons of Israel gave to the Levites the cities and their pasturelands.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:65
content: 65 And they gave by lot from the tribe of the sons of Judah and from the tribe of the sons of Simeon and from the tribe of the sons of Benjamin these cities which they called them by names.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:66
content: 66 And from the clans of the sons of Kohath; and there were cities of their territory from the tribe of Ephraim.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:67
content: 67 And they gave to them the cities of refuge: Shechem and its pasturelands in the hill country of Ephraim, and Gezer and its pasturelands,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:68
content: 68 and Jokmeam and its pasturelands, and Beth Horon and its pasturelands,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:69
content: 69 and Aijalon and its pasturelands, and Gath Rimmon and its pasturelands.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:70
content: 70 And from the half tribe of Manasseh, Aner and its pasturelands, and Bileam and its pasturelands, for the clans of the sons of Kohath remaining.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:71
content: 71 To the sons of Gershon from the clans of the half tribe of Manasseh: Golan in Bashan and its pasturelands, and Ashtaroth and its pasturelands.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:72
content: 72 And from the tribe of Issachar: Kedesh and its pasturelands, Daberath and its pasturelands,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:73
content: 73 and Ramoth and its pasturelands, and Anem and its pasturelands.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:74
content: 74 And from the tribe of Asher: Mashal and its pasturelands, and Abdon and its pasturelands,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:75
content: 75 and Hukok and its pasturelands, and Rehob and its pasturelands.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:76
content: 76 And from the tribe of Naphtali: Kedesh in Galilee and its pasturelands, and Hammon and its pasturelands, and Kiriathaim and its pasturelands.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:77
content: 77 To the sons of Merari remaining: from the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmono and its pasturelands, Tabor and its pasturelands;

title: 1 Chronicles 6:78
content: 78 and from beyond the Jordan at Jericho, to the east of the Jordan from the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness and its pasturelands, and Jahzah and its pasturelands,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:79
content: 79 and Kedemoth and its pasturelands, and Mephaath and its pasturelands.

title: 1 Chronicles 6:80
content: 80 And from the tribe of Gad: Ramoth in Gilead and its pasturelands, and Mahanaim and its pasturelands,

title: 1 Chronicles 6:81
content: 81 and Heshbon and its pasturelands, and Jazer and its pasturelands.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:1
content: 1 And to the sons of Issachar: Tola, and Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:2
content: 2 And the sons of Tola: Uzzi, and Rephaiah, and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Ibsam, and Samuel, the heads of the house of their fathers, from of Tola, mighty of strength in their generations. Their number in the days of David, 22, 600.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:3
content: 3 And the sons of Uzzi: Izrahiah. And the sons of Izrahiah: Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, and Ishijah, five heads all of them.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:4
content: 4 And along with them, by their generations according to the house of their fathers, troops of the army of war, 36,000; for they multiplied wives and sons.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:5
content: 5 And their brothers of all the clans of Issachar, mighty of strength, 87,000 listed in their genealogy in all.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:6
content: 6 Of Benjamin: Bela, and Beker, and Jediael, three.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:7
content: 7 And the sons of Bela: Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five heads of the house of their fathers, mighty of strength, and listed in their genealogy, 22,034.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:8
content: 8 And the sons of Beker: Zemirah, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jeremoth, and Abijah, and Anathoth, and Alemeth. All these, the sons of Beker,

title: 1 Chronicles 7:9
content: 9 and listed in their genealogy, according to their generations, heads of the house of their fathers, mighty of strength, 20,200.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:10
content: 10 And the sons of Jediael: Bilhan. And the sons of Bilhan: Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Kenaanah, and Zethan, and Tarshish, and Ahishahar.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:11
content: 11 All these, the sons of Jediael, according to the heads of their fathers, mighty of strength, 17,200, going out as an army to battle.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:12
content: 12 And Shuppim and Huppim, the sons of Ir. Hushim, the sons of Aher.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:13
content: 13 The sons of Naphtali: Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem, the sons of Bilhah.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:14
content: 14 The sons of Manasseh: Asriel, whom his Aramean concubine bore. She bore Makir, the father of Gilead.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:15
content: 15 And Makir took a wife of Huppim and of Shuppim. And the name of his sister, Maakah. And the name of the second, Zelophehad. And to Zelophehad there were daughters.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:16
content: 16 And Maakah, the wife of Makir, bore a son and she called his name Peresh. And the name of his brother, Sheresh; and his sons, Ulam and Rakem.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:17
content: 17 And the sons of Ulam: Bedan. These, the sons of Gilead, the son of Makir, the son of Manasseh.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:18
content: 18 And his sister Hammoleketh bore Ishhod, and Abiezer, and Mahlah.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:19
content: 19 And the sons of Shemida were Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:20
content: 20 And the sons of Ephraim: Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and Eleadah his son, and Tahath his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 7:21
content: 21 and Zabad his son, and Shuthelah his son, and Ezer and Elead. And the men of Gath who were born in the land killed them because they came down to take their livestock.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:22
content: 22 And Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brothers came to comfort him.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:23
content: 23 And he went into his wife. And she conceived. And she bore a son. And he called his name Beriah, because disaster was in his house.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:24
content: 24 And his daughter, Sheerah, and she built Lower Beth Horon, and the Upper, and Uzzen Sheerah.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:25
content: 25 And Rephah, his son, and Resheph, and Telah, his son, and Tahan, his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 7:26
content: 26 Ladan, his son, Ammihud, his son, Elishama, his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 7:27
content: 27 Non, his son, Joshua, his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:28
content: 28 And their possessions and their dwellings: Bethel and its daughters. And to the east, Naaran. And to the west, Gezer and its daughters, and Shechem and its daughters as far as Ayyah and its daughters.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:29
content: 29 And on the hands of the sons of Manasseh, Beth Shan and its daughters, Taanach and its daughters, Megiddo and its daughters, Dor and its daughters. In these lived the sons of Joseph, the son of Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:30
content: 30 The sons of Asher: Imnah, and Ishvah, and Ishvi, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:31
content: 31 And the sons of Beriah: Heber and Malkiel; he, the father of Birzaith.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:32
content: 32 And Heber fathered Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:33
content: 33 And the sons of Japhlet: Pasak, and Bimhal, and Ashvath. These, the sons of Japhlet.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:34
content: 34 And the sons of Shamer: Ahi, and Rohgah, and Hubbah, and Aram.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:35
content: 35 And the sons of Helem his brother: Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:36
content: 36 And the sons of Zophah: Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,

title: 1 Chronicles 7:37
content: 37 Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Ithran, and Beera.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:38
content: 38 And the sons of Jether: Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:39
content: 39 And the sons of Ulla: Arah, and Hanniel, and Rizia.

title: 1 Chronicles 7:40
content: 40 All these, the sons of Asher, heads of the house of their fathers, chosen, mighty of strength, heads of the chiefs. And listed in their genealogy in the army for war, their number, 26,000 men.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:1
content: 1 And Benjamin fathered Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:2
content: 2 Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:3
content: 3 And there were sons to Bela: Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:4
content: 4 and Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:5
content: 5 and Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:6
content: 6 And these, the sons of Ehud: these, they, heads of fathers, belonging to those dwelling in Geba. And they took them into exile to Manahath:

title: 1 Chronicles 8:7
content: 7 and Naaman, and Ahijah, and Gera. He took them into exile, and he fathered Uzzah and Ahihud.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:8
content: 8 And Shaharaim fathered in the field of Moab, after he sent them away, Hushim and Baara, his wives.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:9
content: 9 And he fathered from Hodesh his wife: Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malkam,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:10
content: 10 and Jeuz, and Sakia, and Mirmah. These, his sons, heads of fathers.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:11
content: 11 And from Hushim he fathered Abitub and Elpaal.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:12
content: 12 And the sons of Elpaal: Eber, and Misham, and Shemed, he built Ono and Lod and its daughters;

title: 1 Chronicles 8:13
content: 13 and Beriah and Shema. They, heads of the fathers to those living in Aijalon; they caused those living in Gath to flee.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:14
content: 14 and Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:15
content: 15 and Zebadiah, and Arad, and Eder,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:16
content: 16 and Michael, and Ishpah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:17
content: 17 And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hizki, and Heber,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:18
content: 18 and Ishmerai, and Izliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:19
content: 19 And Jakim, and Zikri, and Zabdi,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:20
content: 20 and Elienai, and Zillethai, and Eliel,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:21
content: 21 and Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimei.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:22
content: 22 And Ishpan, and Eber, and Eliel,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:23
content: 23 and Abdon, and Zikri, and Hanan,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:24
content: 24 and Hananiah, and Elam, and Anthothijah,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:25
content: 25 and Iphdeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:26
content: 26 And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:27
content: 27 and Jaareshiah, and Elijah, and Zikri, the sons of Jeroham.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:28
content: 28 These, heads of fathers by their generations, heads. They lived in Jerusalem.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:29
content: 29 And in Gibeon, they lived: the father of Gibeon, and the name of his wife, Maakah,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:30
content: 30 and his son, the firstborn, Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

title: 1 Chronicles 8:31
content: 31 and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zeker.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:32
content: 32 And Mikloth fathered Shimeah. And also they, opposite their brothers, lived in Jerusalem with their brothers.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:33
content: 33 And Ner fathered Kish. And Kish fathered Saul. And Saul fathered Jonathan, and Malki-Shua, and Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:34
content: 34 And the son of Jonathan, Merib-Baal. And Merib-Baal fathered Micah.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:35
content: 35 And the sons of Micah: Pithon, and Melek, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:36
content: 36 And Ahaz fathered Jehoaddah. And Jehoaddah fathered Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri. And Zimri fathered Moza.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:37
content: 37 And Moza fathered Binea. Raphah his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:38
content: 38 And to Azel six sons. And these, their names: Azrikam, Bokeru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these, the sons of Azel.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:39
content: 39 And the sons of Eshek, his brother: Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

title: 1 Chronicles 8:40
content: 40 And the sons of Ulam were men mighty in strength, who bent the bow, and multipliers of sons and sons of sons, 150. All these from the sons of Benjamin.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:1
content: 1 And all Israel were listed in genealogy, and behold, they are written on the scroll of the kings of Israel. And Judah was taken into exile to Babylon because of their unfaithfulness.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:2
content: 2 And the first inhabitants who were in their possession, in their cities: Israel, the priests, the Levites, and the temple servants.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:3
content: 3 And in Jerusalem they lived, from the sons of Judah, and from the sons of Benjamin, and from the sons of Ephraim and Manasseh.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:4
content: 4 Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, from the sons of Perez, the son of Judah.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:5
content: 5 And from the Shilonites: Asaiah the firstborn and his sons.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:6
content: 6 And from the sons of Zerah: Jeuel and their brothers, 690.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:7
content: 7 And from the sons of Benjamin: Sallu, the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hassenuah,

title: 1 Chronicles 9:8
content: 8 and Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Mikri, and Meshullam the son of Shephatiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah,

title: 1 Chronicles 9:9
content: 9 and their brothers according to their generations, 956. All these men, heads of fathers, according to the house of their fathers.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:10
content: 10 And from the priests: Jedaiah, and Jehoiarib, and Jakin,

title: 1 Chronicles 9:11
content: 11 and Azariah, the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the leader of the house of God,

title: 1 Chronicles 9:12
content: 12 and Adaiah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashhur, the son of Malkijah, and Maasai, the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer,

title: 1 Chronicles 9:13
content: 13 and their brothers, heads of the house of their fathers, 1,760, mighty of strength for the work of the service of the house of God.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:14
content: 14 And from the Levites: Shemaiah, the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, from the sons of Merari,

title: 1 Chronicles 9:15
content: 15 and Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal, and Mattaniah, the son of Mika, the son of Zikri, the son of Asaph,

title: 1 Chronicles 9:16
content: 16 and Obadiah, the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berekiah, the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, who lived in the villages of the Netophathites.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:17
content: 17 And the gatekeepers: Shallum, and Akkub, and Talmon, and Ahiman, and their brothers; Shallum, the head.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:18
content: 18 And until now in the gate of the king to the east, they were the gatekeepers for the camps of the sons of Levi.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:19
content: 19 And Shallum, the son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah, and his brothers of the house of his father, the Korahites, were over the work of the service, the keepers of the thresholds of the tent, and their fathers over the camp of Yahweh, the keepers of the entrance.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:20
content: 20 And Phinehas the son of Eleazar was leader over them before faces; Yahweh was with him.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:21
content: 21 Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah, gatekeeper of the entrance to the tent of meeting.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:22
content: 22 All those chosen as gatekeepers at the thresholds, 212. They in their villages listed in their genealogy, they, David and Samuel the seer, established in their official duty.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:23
content: 23 And they and their sons over the gates of the house of Yahweh, of the house of the tent as guards.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:24
content: 24 To the four winds were the gatekeepers, east, west, north, and south.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:25
content: 25 And their brothers in their villages were to come for seven days from time to time with these.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:26
content: 26 For in official duty, they, the four leaders of the gatekeepers, they were Levites, and they were over the chambers and over the treasuries of the house of God.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:27
content: 27 And around the house of God they would lodge, for on them was the watch. And they were over the key and morning by morning.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:28
content: 28 And from them over the utensils of the service, for by number they would bring them in and by number they would bring them out.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:29
content: 29 And from them ones who were appointed over the vessels and over all the utensils of the Holy Place, and over the fine flour, and the wine, and the oil, and the frankincense, and the spices.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:30
content: 30 And from the sons of the priests, mixers of the ointment for the spices.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:31
content: 31 And Mattithiah, from the Levites, he the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite, in official duty over the work of the flat cakes.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:32
content: 32 And from the sons of the Kohathites, from their brothers, over the bread of the rows, to prepare Sabbath by Sabbath.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:33
content: 33 And these, the singers, the heads of the fathers of the Levites in the chambers were free, for by day and by night they were over them in the work.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:34
content: 34 These, the heads of the fathers of the Levites, according to their generations, heads. These lived in Jerusalem.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:35
content: 35 And in Gibeon, they lived, the father of Gibeon, Jeiel, and the name of his wife, Maakah,

title: 1 Chronicles 9:36
content: 36 and his son, the firstborn, Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Ner, and Nadab,

title: 1 Chronicles 9:37
content: 37 and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zechariah, and Mikloth.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:38
content: 38 And Mikloth fathered Shimeam. And also they, opposite their brothers, lived in Jerusalem with their brothers.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:39
content: 39 And Ner fathered Kish. And Kish fathered Saul. And Saul fathered Jonathan, and Malki-Shua, and Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:40
content: 40 And the son of Jonathan, Merib-Baal. And Merib-Baal fathered Micah.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:41
content: 41 And the sons of Micah: Pithon, and Melek, and Tahrea.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:42
content: 42 And Ahaz fathered Jarah. And Jarah fathered Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri. And Zimri fathered Moza.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:43
content: 43 And Moza fathered Binea. And Rephaiah his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 9:44
content: 44 And to Azel six sons, and these, their names: Azrikam, Bokeru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. These, the sons of Azel.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:1
content: 1 And the Philistines fought with Israel. And the men of Israel fled from the faces of the Philistines, and they fell slain on Mount Gilboa.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:2
content: 2 And the Philistines pursued after Saul and after his sons. And the Philistines struck down Jonathan, and Abinadab, and Malki-Shua, the sons of Saul.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:3
content: 3 And the battle was heavy against Saul, and those who shoot with the bow found him, and he writhed in pain from the ones shooting.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:4
content: 4 Then Saul said to the lifter of his equipment, Draw your sword and pierce me with it, lest these uncircumcised will come and mistreat me. But the lifter of his equipment was not willing, for he feared greatly. And Saul took the sword, and he fell on it.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:5
content: 5 And the lifter of his equipment saw that Saul had died, and he himself likewise fell on the sword, and he died.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:6
content: 6 And Saul died, and his three sons. And all his house died together.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:7
content: 7 And every man of Israel who was in the valley saw that they had fled, and that Saul and his sons had died. And they abandoned their cities, and they fled. And the Philistines came, and they lived in them.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:8
content: 8 And it happened on the next day, and the Philistines came to strip the slain, and they found Saul and his sons fallen on Mount Gilboa.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:9
content: 9 And they stripped him, and they carried away his head and his armor. And they sent among the land of the Philistines all around to bring news to their idols and the people.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:10
content: 10 And they put his armor in the house of their gods, and his head they fastened in the house of Dagon.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:11
content: 11 And all Jabesh Gilead heard all that the Philistines did to Saul,

title: 1 Chronicles 10:12
content: 12 and all the men of strength rose, and they carried the corpse of Saul and the corpses of his sons. And they brought them to Jabesh. And they buried their bones under the large tree in Jabesh, and they fasted seven days.

title: 1 Chronicles 10:13
content: 13 And Saul died because of his infidelity which he was unfaithful to Yahweh on account of the word of Yahweh which he did not keep, and also to ask a medium to seek,

title: 1 Chronicles 10:14
content: 14 and he did not seek Yahweh, and he killed him. And he turned the kingdom to David, the son of Jesse.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:1
content: 1 And all Israel gathered to David at Hebron, saying, Look, your bones and your flesh are we.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:2
content: 2 Even yesterday also the day before that, even when Saul was king, you were the one who brought out and the one who brought in Israel. And Yahweh your God said to you, You yourself will shepherd my people, Israel, and you yourself will be leader over my people Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:3
content: 3 And all the elders of Israel came to the king at Hebron, and David cut with them a covenant at Hebron before the face of Yahweh. And they anointed David king over Israel according to the word of Yahweh by the hand of Samuel.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:4
content: 4 And David went and all Israel to Jerusalem; that is, Jebus. And there were the Jebusites, the inhabitants of the land.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:5
content: 5 And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David, You will not come in here. But David captured the stronghold of Zion, that is, the city of David.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:6
content: 6 And David said, Whoever strikes down the Jebusites first will become head and chief. And Joab the son of Zeruiah went up first, and he became head.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:7
content: 7 And David lived in the stronghold; therefore they called it the city of David.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:8
content: 8 And he built the city all around, from the Millo and as far as that which surrounds. And Joab restored the rest of the city.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:9
content: 9 And David went, going and becoming great, and Yahweh of Hosts was with him.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:10
content: 10 And these, the heads of the mighty ones who belonged to David strengthened themselves with him in his kingdom, with all Israel, to make him king, according to the word of Yahweh concerning Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:11
content: 11 And these, the number of the mighty ones who belonged to David: Jashobeam, a son of a Hachmonite, the head of the officers. He swung his spear against 300, slain at one time.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:12
content: 12 And after him, Eleazar the son of Dodo, the Ahohite, he among the three mighty ones.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:13
content: 13 He was with David at Pas Dammim, and the Philistines had assembled there for battle. And there was a portion of the field full of barley. And the peope fled from the faces of the Philistines.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:14
content: 14 And they took their stand in the midst of the portion. And they delivered it, and they struck down the Philistines. And Yahweh saved a great salvation.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:15
content: 15 And three from the 30 heads went down to the rock to David, to the cave of Adullam. And the camp of the Philistines encamped in the Valley of Rephaim.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:16
content: 16 And David then was in the stronghold, and the garrison of the Philistines then was in Bethlehem.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:17
content: 17 And David desired, and he said, Who will give me water to drink from the well of Bethlehem which is by the gate?

title: 1 Chronicles 11:18
content: 18 And the three broke through the camp of the Philistines, and they drew water from the well of Bethlehem which was by the gate. And they carried, and they brought to David. But David was not willing to drink it, and he poured it out to Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:19
content: 19 And he said, Far be it from me before my God from doing this! Do I drink the blood of these men with their lives? For with their lives they brought it. And he was not willing to drink it. These, the three mighty ones did.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:20
content: 20 And Abshai, the brother of Joab, he was the head of the Three. And he swung his spear against 300, slain. And to him a name among the Three.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:21
content: 21 From the Three, in the second he was honored and he became to them a chief, but up to the Three he did not enter.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:22
content: 22 Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the son of a man of strength, great deeds, from Kabzeel. He himself struck down the two of Ariel of Moab. And he himself went down, and he struck down the lion in the midst of the pit on the day of the snow.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:23
content: 23 And he himself struck down the man of Egypt, a man of stature, five cubits. And in the hand of the Egyptian, a spear like the beam of weavers, but he went down to him with a staff. And he seized the spear from the hand of the Egyptian, and he killed him with his spear.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:24
content: 24 These, Benaiah the son of Jehoiada did, and to him a name among the three mighty ones.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:25
content: 25 From the 30, behold, he himself was honored, but to the three, he did not enter. And David set him over his bodyguard.

title: 1 Chronicles 11:26
content: 26 And the mighty ones of strength: Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan the son of Dodo from Bethlehem,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:27
content: 27 Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:28
content: 28 Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abiezer the Anathothite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:29
content: 29 Sibbekai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:30
content: 30 Maharai the Netophathite, Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:31
content: 31 Ithai the son of Ribai from Gibeah of the sons of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:32
content: 32 Hurai from the valleys of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:33
content: 33 Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:34
content: 34 the sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan the son of Shagee the Hararite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:35
content: 35 Ahiam the son of Sakar the Hararite, Eliphal the son of Ur,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:36
content: 36 Hepher the Mekerathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:37
content: 37 Hezro the Carmelite, Naarai the son of Ezbai,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:38
content: 38 Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar the son of Hagri,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:39
content: 39 Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Berothite, the lifter of the equipment of Joab the son of Zeruiah,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:40
content: 40 Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:41
content: 41 Uriah the Hittite, Zabad the son of Ahlai,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:42
content: 42 Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a head of the Reubenites, and with him 30,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:43
content: 43 Hanan the son of Maacah, and Joshaphat the Mithnite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:44
content: 44 Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jeiel the sons of Hotham the Aroerite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:45
content: 45 Jediael the son of Shimri, and Joha his brother, the Tizite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:46
content: 46 Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,

title: 1 Chronicles 11:47
content: 47 Eliel, and Obed, and Jaasiel the Mezobaite.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:1
content: 1 And these, the ones who came to David at Ziklag, while he was one restrained from the face of Saul the son of Kish. And they were among the mighty ones, helping the battle.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:2
content: 2 They were armed with a bow, right-handed and left-handed with stones and with arrows with the bow, from the brothers of Saul, from Benjamin.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:3
content: 3 The head, Ahiezer, and Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite, and Jeziel and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth, and Berakah, and Jehu the Anathothite,

title: 1 Chronicles 12:4
content: 4 and Ishmaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty one among the 30 and over the 30, and Jeremiah, and Jahaziel, and Johanan, and Jozabad the Gederathite,

title: 1 Chronicles 12:5
content: 5 Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, Shephatiah the Haruphite,

title: 1 Chronicles 12:6
content: 6 Elkanah, and Isshiah, and Azarel, and Joezer, and Jashobeam, the Korahites,

title: 1 Chronicles 12:7
content: 7 and Joelah and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham from Gedor.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:8
content: 8 And from the Gadites they separated themselves to David at the stronghold in the wilderness, mighty in strength, men of the army for battle, ready with shield and spear, and faces of lions were their faces, and like gazelles on the hills to hasten.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:9
content: 9 Ezer the head, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,

title: 1 Chronicles 12:10
content: 10 Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,

title: 1 Chronicles 12:11
content: 11 Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,

title: 1 Chronicles 12:12
content: 12 Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,

title: 1 Chronicles 12:13
content: 13 Jeremiah the tenth, Makbannai the 11th.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:14
content: 14 These from the sons of Gad, the heads of the army. One for 100, the least; and the greatest for 1,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:15
content: 15 These, they who passed over the Jordan in the first month, and it was filling over all its banks, and caused to flee all the valleys, to the east and to the west.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:16
content: 16 And from the sons of Benjamin and Judah came to the stronghold to David.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:17
content: 17 And David went out before their faces, and he answered, and he said to them: If for peace you have come to me, to help me, my heart will be to you all for unity. But if to betray me to my adversaries, with no violence in my palms, may the God of our fathers see and rebuke.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:18
content: 18 And the Spirit clothed Amasai, the head of the 30: To you, O David, and with you, O Son of Jesse. Peace, peace to you and peace to the one who helps you, for your God has helped you. And David received them and placed them as the heads of the troop.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:19
content: 19 And from Manasseh fell upon David when he went with the Philistines against Saul to battle. And they did not help them because by counsel the governors of the Philistines sent them away, saying, By our heads he will fall to his lord, Saul.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:20
content: 20 In his going to Ziklag, they fell upon him from Manasseh: Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zillethai, the heads of the thousands who were of Manasseh.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:21
content: 21 And they helped with David against the troop, for mighty ones of strength, all of them, and they were chiefs in the army.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:22
content: 22 For at the time of day by day, they were coming to David to help him, until there was a great camp, like the camp of God.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:23
content: 23 And these, the numbers of the heads of those equipped for war. They came to David at Hebron to turn the kingdom of Saul to him according to the mouth of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:24
content: 24 The sons of Judah, those carrying shield and spear, 6,800, equipped for war.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:25
content: 25 From the sons of Simeon, mighty ones of strength for war, 7,100.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:26
content: 26 From the sons of Levi, 4,600.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:27
content: 27 And Jehoiada, the leader from Aaron, and with him, 3,700.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:28
content: 28 And Zadok, a young, mighty one of strength, and the house of his father, 22 chiefs.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:29
content: 29 And from the sons of Benjamin, the brothers of Saul, 3,000. And until then the majority of them were keeping the charge of the house of Saul.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:30
content: 30 And from the sons of Ephraim, 20,800 mighty ones of strength, men of names, according to the house of their fathers.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:31
content: 31 And from the half tribe of Manasseh, 18,000 who were marked by names to come to make David king.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:32
content: 32 And from the sons of Issachar, those who knew understanding of the times to know what Israel should do, their heads, 200, and all their brothers according to their mouth.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:33
content: 33 From Zebulun, those going out for war, prepared for battle with all the weapons of battle, 50,000, and to help with no heart and a heart.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:34
content: 34 And from Naphtali, 1,000 chiefs, and with them with shield and spear, 37,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:35
content: 35 And from the Danites, prepared for battle, 28,600.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:36
content: 36 And from Asher those going out for war to prepare for battle, 40,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:37
content: 37 And from beyond the Jordan, from the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh, with all the weapons of war for battle, 120,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:38
content: 38 All these men of battle, helpers of the battle line; with a whole heart, they came to Hebron to make David king over all Israel. And also all the rest of Israel was of one heart to make David king.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:39
content: 39 And they were there with David three days, eating and drinking, for their brothers had prepared for them.

title: 1 Chronicles 12:40
content: 40 And also, those near to them, as far as Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, were bringing bread on donkeys, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen; food of flour, fig cakes, and raisins cakes, and wine, and oil, and oxen, and sheep, in abundance, for joy was in Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:1
content: 1 And David consulted with the chiefs of thousands and of hundreds, to every leader.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:2
content: 2 And David said to all the assembly of Israel, If to you all it is good, and from Yahweh our God, let us break out, let us send to our brothers who remain in all the regions of Israel, and with them the priests and the Levites in the cities of their pasturelands. And let them gather to us.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:3
content: 3 And let us return the Box of our God to us, for we did not seek it in the days of Saul.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:4
content: 4 And all the assembly said to do thus, for the thing was right in the eyes of all the people.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:5
content: 5 And David assembled all Israel from Shihor of Egypt and as far as Lebo Hamath, to bring in the Box of God from Kiriath Jearim.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:6
content: 6 And David went up and all Israel to Baalah, to Kiriath Jearim, which belongs to Judah, to bring up from there the Box of God Yahweh who sits over the cherubim which is called by name.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:7
content: 7 And they transported the Box of God on a new cart from the house of Abinadab; and Uzzah and Ahio were driving the cart.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:8
content: 8 And David and all Israel were celebrating before the face of God with all might, and with songs, and lyres, and harps, and tambourines, and cymbals, and trumpets.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:9
content: 9 And they came to the threshing floor of Kidon, and Uzzah sent out his hand to grasp the Box for the oxen stumbled.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:10
content: 10 And the anger of Yahweh burned against Uzzah, and He struck him down because he sent out his hand on the Box. And he died there before the face of God.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:11
content: 11 And David became angry because Yahweh broke out a breaking out against Uzzah. And he called that place Perez Uzzah until this day.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:12
content: 12 And David feared God in that day, saying, How will I bring to myself the Box of God?

title: 1 Chronicles 13:13
content: 13 And David did not remove the Box to himself, to the city of David, but he turned it to the house of Obed Edom the Gittite.

title: 1 Chronicles 13:14
content: 14 And the Box of God dwelt with the house of Obed Edom in his house three months. And Yahweh blessed the house of Obed Edom and all that belonged to him.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:1
content: 1 And Hiram the king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and wood of cedar, and craftsmen of a wall, and craftsmen of wood to build for him a house.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:2
content: 2 And David knew that Yahweh had established him as king over Israel, that his kingdom was lifted upwards for the sake of his people Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:3
content: 3 And David took more wives in Jerusalem, and David fathered more sons and daughters.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:4
content: 4 And these, the names of those born who were to him in Jerusalem: Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon,

title: 1 Chronicles 14:5
content: 5 and Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpelet,

title: 1 Chronicles 14:6
content: 6 and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

title: 1 Chronicles 14:7
content: 7 and Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphelet.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:8
content: 8 Now the Philistines heard that David was anointed as king over all Israel, and all the Philistines went up to seek David. And David heard and went out before their faces.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:9
content: 9 And the Philistines went, and they raided in the Valley of Rephaim.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:10
content: 10 Then David asked God, saying, Should I go up against the Philistines? And will you give them into my hand? And Yahweh said to him, Go up and I will give them into your hand.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:11
content: 11 And they went up to Baal Perazim, and David struck them down there. And David said, God has broken through my enemies by my hand like a breaking through of waters. Therefore they called the name of that place Baal Perazim.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:12
content: 12 And they abandoned their gods there, and David ordered, and they were burned with fire.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:13
content: 13 And the Philistines acted yet again, and they raided in the valley.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:14
content: 14 And David asked God again. And God said to him, Do not go up after them; circle around from upon them and come at them in front of the balsam trees.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:15
content: 15 And it shall be when you hear the sound of the marching in the heads of the balsam trees, at that time you shall go out in battle. For God has gone out before your face to strike down the camp of the Philistines.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:16
content: 16 And David did just as God commanded him. And he struck down the camp of the Philistines, from Gibeon and as far as Gezer.

title: 1 Chronicles 14:17
content: 17 And the name of David went out into all the lands, and Yahweh placed the fear of him on all the nations.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:1
content: 1 And he made for himself houses in the city of David. And he prepared a place for the Box of God, and he stretched out a tent for it.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:2
content: 2 Then David said, No one shall carry the Box of God, but only the Levites. For them Yahweh chose to carry the Box of Yahweh and to minister for him forever.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:3
content: 3 And David assembled all Israel to Jerusalem to bring up the Box of Yahweh to its place which he had prepared for it.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:4
content: 4 And David gathered the sons of Aaron and the Levites.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:5
content: 5 Of the sons of Kohath, Uriel the chief and his brothers, 120.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:6
content: 6 Of the sons of Merari, Asaiah the chief and his brothers, 220.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:7
content: 7 Of the sons of Gershom, Joel the chief and his brothers, 130.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:8
content: 8 Of the sons of Elizaphan, Shemaiah the chief and his brothers, 200.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:9
content: 9 Of the sons of Hebron, Eliel the chief and his brothers, 80.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:10
content: 10 Of the sons of Uzziel, Amminadab the chief and his brothers, 112.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:11
content: 11 And David called for Zadok and for Abiathar the priests, and for the Levites, for Uriel, Asaiah, and Joel, Shemaiah, and Eliel, and Amminadab.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:12
content: 12 And he said to them, You are the heads of the fathers of the Levites. Consecrate yourselves, you and your brothers, and bring up the Box of Yahweh, the God of Israel, to where I prepared for it.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:13
content: 13 Because at the first it was not you, Yahweh our God broke out against us, for we did not seek him according to the judgment.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:14
content: 14 And the priests and the Levites consecrated themselves to bring up the Box of Yahweh, the God of Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:15
content: 15 And the sons of Levi carried the Box of God just as Moses commanded, according to the word of Yahweh, on their shoulders with poles on them.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:16
content: 16 And David said to the chiefs of the Levites to assign their brothers as the singers with instruments of song, harps, and lyres, and cymbals, playing to raise a sound of joy.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:17
content: 17 And the Levites assigned Heman the son of Joel and from his brothers, Asaph the son of Berechiah, and from the sons of Merari their brothers, Ethan the son of Kushaiah,

title: 1 Chronicles 15:18
content: 18 and with them, their brothers of the second rank: Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Eliphelehu, and Mikneiah, and Obed Edom, and Jeiel, the gatekeepers.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:19
content: 19 And the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, with bronze cymbals to play.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:20
content: 20 And Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah with harps, according to Alamoth.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:21
content: 21 And Mattithiah, and Eliphelehu, and Mikneiah, and Obed Edom, and Jeiel, and Azaziah with lyres, according to the Sheminith to lead.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:22
content: 22 And Kenaniah, the chief of the Levites in lifting up, an instructor in lifting up, for he was one who understood.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:23
content: 23 And Berechiah and Elkanah, gatekeepers for the Box.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:24
content: 24 And Shebaniah, and Joshaphat, and Nethanel, and Amasai, and Zechariah, and Benaiah, and Eliezer, the priests, the ones to blow the trumpets before the face of the Box of God. And Obed Edom and Jehiah, gatekeepers for the Box.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:25
content: 25 And it happened David, and the elders of Israel, and the chiefs of thousands were going to bring up the Box of the covenant of Yahweh from the house of Obed Edom with joy.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:26
content: 26 And it happened when God helped the Levites carrying the Box of the covenant of Yahweh, and they slaughtered seven bulls and seven rams.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:27
content: 27 And David was clothed in a robe of fine linen, and all the Levites carrying the Box, and the singers, and Kenaniah, the chief of the lifting up of the singers. And on David, an ephod of linen.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:28
content: 28 And all Israel was bringing up the Box of the covenant of Yahweh with shouting of joy, and with a sound of a horn and with trumpets, and with cymbals, playing with harps and lyres.

title: 1 Chronicles 15:29
content: 29 And it happened the Box of the covenant of Yahweh was coming to the city of David, and Michal the daughter of Saul, looked down out of the window. And she saw the king, David, dancing and celebrating. And she despised him in her heart.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:1
content: 1 And they brought in the Box of God and put it in the midst of the tent that David streched out for it. And they offered burnt offerings and peace offerings before the face of God.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:2
content: 2 And David finished bringing up the burnt offering and the peace offerings, and he blessed the people in the name of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:3
content: 3 And he distributed to each person of Israel, from man and as far as woman, to each a loaf of bread, and a date cake, and a raisin cake.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:4
