content: 4 And he appointed before the face of the Box of Yahweh from the Levites as ones who minister, and to commemorate and to thank and to praise Yahweh, the God of Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:5
content: 5 Asaph the head, and second to him Zechariah, Jeiel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Mattithiah, and Eliab, and Benaiah, and Obed Edom, and Jeiel, with instruments of harps and lyres, and Asaph with cymbals was playing,

title: 1 Chronicles 16:6
content: 6 and Benaiah and Jahaziel the priests with trumpets regularly, before the face of the Box of the covenant of God.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:7
content: 7 On that day then David first appointed to thank Yahweh by the hand of Asaph and his brothers.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:8
content: 8 Give thanks to Yahweh, call on his name; make known among the peoples his deeds.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:9
content: 9 Sing to him, make music to him; tell of all his wonderful acts.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:10
content: 10 Glory in his holy name; let the heart of those who seek Yahweh rejoice.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:11
content: 11 Seek Yahweh and his strength; seek his face continually.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:12
content: 12 Remember his wonderful acts which he has done, his miracles and the judgments of his mouth,

title: 1 Chronicles 16:13
content: 13 O seed of Israel his servant, O sons of Jacob, his chosen ones.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:14
content: 14 He is Yahweh, our God; in all the earth are his judgments.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:15
content: 15 Remember forever his covenant, the word he commanded for 1,000 generations,

title: 1 Chronicles 16:16
content: 16 which he cut with Abraham, and his oath to Isaac.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:17
content: 17 And he established it for Jacob as a statute, for Israel a covenant forever,

title: 1 Chronicles 16:18
content: 18 saying, To you I will give the land of Canaan the allotment of your inheritance.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:19
content: 19 When you all were few in number, insignificant, and sojourners in it,

title: 1 Chronicles 16:20
content: 20 and they walked back and forth from nation to nation, and from a kingdom to another people,

title: 1 Chronicles 16:21
content: 21 he did not permit a person to oppress them; and he rebuked kings on account of them.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:22
content: 22 Do not strike my anointed ones, and against my prophets do not do evil.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:23
content: 23 Sing to Yahweh, all the earth; announce from day to day his salvation.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:24
content: 24 Recount among the nations his glory, among all the peoples his wonderful acts.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:25
content: 25 For great is Yahweh and to be praised much, and to be feared is he above all gods.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:26
content: 26 For all the gods of the peoples are worthless, but Yahweh, the heavens he made.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:27
content: 27 Splendor and majesty are before his face; strength and joy in his place.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:28
content: 28 Ascribe to Yahweh, O clans of peoples, ascribe to Yahweh glory and strength!

title: 1 Chronicles 16:29
content: 29 Ascribe to Yahweh the glory of his name; bring an offering and come before his face; worship Yahweh in holy splendor.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:30
content: 30 Tremble from before his face, all the earth. Indeed, the world is established; it cannot be shaken.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:31
content: 31 Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth shout in exultation; and let them say among the nations, Yahweh reigns.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:32
content: 32 Let the sea roar and that which fills it. Let the field exult, and all that is in it.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:33
content: 33 Then the trees of the forest will shout for joy from before the face of Yahweh, for he is coming to judge the earth.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:34
content: 34 Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for forever is his loyal love.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:35
content: 35 And say, Save us, God of our salvation, and gather us and deliver us from the nations, to give thanks to your holy name, to boast in your praise.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:36
content: 36 Blessed be Yahweh, the God of Israel, from everlasting and as far as everlasting. And all the people said, Amen and praised Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:37
content: 37 And he left there before the face of the Box of the covenant of Yahweh Asaph and his brothers to minister before the face of the Box continually, according to the matter of the day in its day,

title: 1 Chronicles 16:38
content: 38 and Obed Edom and their brothers, 68, and Obed Edom the son of Jeduthun, and Hosah, were gatekeepers,

title: 1 Chronicles 16:39
content: 39 and Zadok the priest and his brothers the priests before the face of the tabernacle of Yahweh at the high place which was in Gibeon

title: 1 Chronicles 16:40
content: 40 to bring up burnt offerings to Yahweh on the altar of burnt offering continually morning and evening, even according to all that is written in the law of Yahweh, which he commanded to Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:41
content: 41 And with them, Heman and Jeduthun and the rest of those chosen who were marked by names to give thanks to Yahweh, for forever is his loyal love.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:42
content: 42 And with them, Heman and Jeduthun for those playing trumpets and cymbals and the instruments of song of God; and the sons of Jeduthun for the gate.

title: 1 Chronicles 16:43
content: 43 And all the people went, each to his house, and David turned around to bless his house.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:1
content: 1 And it happened when David was living in his house, and David said to Nathan the prophet, Behold, I am living in a house of cedars, but the Box of the covenant of Yahweh is under curtains.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:2
content: 2 And Nathan said to David, All which is in your heart, do, for God is with you.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:3
content: 3 And it happened in that night, and the word of God came to Nathan, saying,

title: 1 Chronicles 17:4
content: 4 Go and say to David my servant, Thus says Yahweh: You yourself shall not build for me a house in which to live,

title: 1 Chronicles 17:5
content: 5 for I have not lived in a house from the day that I brought up Israel until this day, but I have been from tent to tent, and from a tabernacle.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:6
content: 6 In all where I have walked back and forth among all Israel, what word did I speak to one of the judges of Israel whom I commanded to shepherd my people, saying, Why have you all not built for me a house of cedars?

title: 1 Chronicles 17:7
content: 7 And now, thus you shall say to my servant, to David, Thus says Yahweh of Hosts: I myself took you from the pasture, from behind sheep, to be a leader over my people Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:8
content: 8 And I have been with you in all where you have gone, and I have cut off all your enemies from before your face, and I will make for you a name, like a name of the great ones who are on the earth.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:9
content: 9 And I will set a place for my people Israel, and I will plant them, and they will settle on it, and they will not tremble again. And the sons of injustice will not continue to trouble them, just as at the first,

title: 1 Chronicles 17:10
content: 10 and from the days that I commanded judges over my people Israel. And I will humble all your enemies. And I declare to you that a house Yahweh will build for you.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:11
content: 11 And it will be when your days are fulfilled, to walk with your fathers, then I will raise up your seed after you who will be from your sons, and I will establish his kingdom.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:12
content: 12 He himself will build for me a house, and I will establish his throne as far as forever.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:13
content: 13 I myself will be to him a father, and he himself will be to me a son. And my covenant faithfulness I will not take away from with him, as I took away from who was before your face.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:14
content: 14 And I will set him up in my house and in my kingdom as far as forever, and his throne will be established as far as forever.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:15
content: 15 According to all these words and according to all this vision, thus Nathan spoke to David.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:16
content: 16 Then the king David went in and sat before the face of Yahweh; and he said, Who am I, Yahweh God, and what is my house, that you have brought me as far as here?

title: 1 Chronicles 17:17
content: 17 And a small thing was this in your eyes, God, and you have spoken regarding the house of your servant from a distance; and you have seen me as an appearance of the man moving upwards, Yahweh God.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:18
content: 18 What more can David still say to you about honoring your servant. And you, your servant you know.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:19
content: 19 Yahweh, for the sake of your servant and according to your heart, you have done all this greatness to make known all the greatnesses.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:20
content: 20 Yahweh, there is none like you, and no God except you, in all which we have heard with our ears.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:21
content: 21 And who is like your people Israel, one nation on the earth whom God went to ransom for himself a people, to set for you a name great and to be feared, to drive out nations from the faces of your people whom you ransomed from Egypt?

title: 1 Chronicles 17:22
content: 22 And you made your people Israel for yourself a people as far as forever, and you, Yahweh, became to them God.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:23
content: 23 And now, Yahweh, the word which you spoke concerning your servant and concerning his house, may it be confirmed as far as forever, and do just as you have spoken.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:24
content: 24 And may it be confirmed and may your name be great as far as forever, saying, Yahweh of Hosts, the God of Israel, is God to Israel, and the house of David your servant established before your face.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:25
content: 25 For you, my God, have uncovered the ear of your servant to build for him a house; therefore your servant has found to pray before your face.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:26
content: 26 And now, Yahweh, you are God, and you have spoken concerning your servant this good.

title: 1 Chronicles 17:27
content: 27 And now, you have decided to bless the house of your servant, to be forever before your face. For you, Yahweh, have blessed, and it is blessed forever.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:1
content: 1 And it happened after this that David struck down the Philistines, and he humbled them. And he took Gath and its daughters from the hand of the Philistines.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:2
content: 2 And he struck down Moab, and the Moabites became servants to David, carriers of tribute.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:3
content: 3 And David struck down Hadadezer, the king of Zobah Hamath, when he went to set up his hand at the Euphrates River.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:4
content: 4 And David captured from him 1,000 chariots, and 7,000 horsemen, and 20,000 men on foot. And David hamstrung all the chariots, but spared from him 100 chariots.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:5
content: 5 And Aram of Damascus came to help Hadadezer the king of Zobah, and David struck down of the Arameans 22,000 men.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:6
content: 6 And David set up in Aram of Damascus, and Aram became servants to David, carriers of tribute. And Yahweh saved David in all where he went.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:7
content: 7 And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and he brought them to Jerusalem.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:8
content: 8 And from Tibhath and from Kun, cities of Hadadezer, David took very much bronze. With it, Solomon made the sea of bronze and the pillars and bronze items.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:9
content: 9 And Tou, the king of Hamath, heard that David struck down all the army of Hadadezer, the king of Zobah.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:10
content: 10 And he sent Hadoram his son to King David to ask him for peace and to bless him because he had fought against Hadadezer and struck him down, for a man of war Tou was with Hadadezer, and all the items of gold and silver and bronze.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:11
content: 11 Also these King David consecrated to Yahweh with the silver and the gold that he carried away from all the nations: from Edom, and from Moab, and from the sons of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:12
content: 12 And Abishai the son of Zeruiah struck down Edom in the Valley of Salt, 18,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:13
content: 13 And he set in Edom garrisons, and all Edom became servants to David. And Yahweh saved David in all where he went.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:14
content: 14 And David reigned over all Israel. And it happened he was doing judgment and righteousness for all his people.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:15
content: 15 And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the army, and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, secretary.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:16
content: 16 And Zadok the son of Ahitub and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, priests, and Shavsha, scribe.

title: 1 Chronicles 18:17
content: 17 And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Kerethites and the Pelethites, and the sons of David, the heads at the hand of the king.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:1
content: 1 And it happened after this, and Nahash, the king of the sons of Ammon, died, and his son reigned in his place.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:2
content: 2 And David said, I will do loyal kindness to Hanun the son of Nahash, because his father did to me loyal kindness. And David sent messengers to comfort him concerning his father. And the servants of David came to the land of the sons of Ammon, to Hanun, to comfort him.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:3
content: 3 And the chiefs of the sons of Ammon said to Hanun, Is David honoring your father in your eyes because he sent to you comforters? Is it not for the sake of to explore and to overthrow and to spy the land his servants came to you?

title: 1 Chronicles 19:4
content: 4 And Hanun took the servants of David, and he shaved them, and he cut their garments in half, until the buttocks, and he sent them away.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:5
content: 5 And they went, and they declared to David concerning the men. And he sent to meet them for the men were greatly humiliated. And the king said, Stay in Jericho until when your beards grow, then return.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:6
content: 6 And the sons of Ammon saw that they were a stench to David, and Hanun sent, and the sons of Ammon, 1,000 talents of silver to hire for themselves from Aram Naharaim, and from Aram Maacah, and from Zobah, chariots and horsemen.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:7
content: 7 And they hired for themselves 32,000 chariots and the king of Maacah and his people. And they came, and they encamped before the face of Medeba. And the sons of Ammon assembled from their cities, and came to battle.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:8
content: 8 And David heard, and he sent Joab and all the army of mighty ones.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:9
content: 9 And the sons of Ammon came out, and they arrayed for battle at the entrance of the city. And the kings who came were by themselves in the field.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:10
content: 10 And Joab saw that the face of the battle was to him faces and hindquarter, and he chose from all the choice ones among Israel, and he arrayed to meet Aram.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:11
content: 11 And the remainder of the people he placed in the hand of Abishai his brother, and they arrayed to meet the sons of Ammon.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:12
content: 12 And he said, If Aram is too strong for me, then you shall be to me for salvation. And if the sons of Ammon are too strong for you, then I will save you.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:13
content: 13 Be strong, and let us strengthen ourselves on behalf of our people and on behalf of the cities of our God, and Yahweh, the good in his eyes, he will do.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:14
content: 14 And Joab drew near, and the people who were with him, before the faces of Aram for battle. And they fled from his face.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:15
content: 15 And the sons of Ammon saw that Aram fled, and these also fled from the face of Abishai his brother. And they came to the city and Joab came to Jerusalem.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:16
content: 16 And Aram saw that they were defeated before the face of Israel. And they sent messengers, and they brought out Aram, who was beyond the river, and Shophak the chief of the army of Hadadezer before their faces.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:17
content: 17 And it was told to David, and he gathered all Israel. And he passed over the Jordan, and he came to them. And he arrayed against them. And David arrayed to meet Aram for battle, and they fought with him.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:18
content: 18 And Aram fled from before the face of Israel, and David killed from Aram 7,000 chariots and 40,000 men on foot. And Shophak the chief of the army, he killed.

title: 1 Chronicles 19:19
content: 19 And the servants of Hadadezer saw that they were defeated before the face of Israel, and they made peace with David, and they served him. And Aram was not willing to save the sons of Ammon again.

title: 1 Chronicles 20:1
content: 1 And it happened at the time of the turning of the year, at the time of the going out of kings, that Joab led out the army for war and he devastated the land of the sons of Ammon. And he came, and he besieged Rabbah. And David stayed in Jerusalem. And Joab struck down Rabbah, and he tore it down.

title: 1 Chronicles 20:2
content: 2 And David took the crown of their king from on his head, and he found the weight was a talent of gold, and in it was a precious stone. And it was on the head of David, and the plunder of the city he brought out, a very great amount.

title: 1 Chronicles 20:3
content: 3 And the people who were in it, he brought out, and they sawed with saws and with sharp instruments of iron and with saws. And thus David did to all the cities of the sons of Ammon. Then David and all the people returned to Jerusalem.

title: 1 Chronicles 20:4
content: 4 And it happened after this that war arose at Gezer with the Philistines. Then Sibbekai the Hushathite struck down Sippai, from the descendants of the Rephaim, and they were humbled.

title: 1 Chronicles 20:5
content: 5 And there was again war with the Philistines, and Elhanan the son of Jair struck down Lahmi the brother of Goliath the Gittite; and the wood of his spear was like a beam of a weaver.

title: 1 Chronicles 20:6
content: 6 And there was again war in Gath. And there was a man of stature. And his digits were six and six, 24, and he also was born of Rapha.

title: 1 Chronicles 20:7
content: 7 And he taunted Israel. And Jonathan the son of Shimea, the brother of David, struck him down.

title: 1 Chronicles 20:8
content: 8 These were born to Rapha in Gath, and they fell by the hand of David and by the hand of his servants.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:1
content: 1 And an adversary stood against Israel, and he incited David to count Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:2
content: 2 And David said to Joab and to the chiefs of the people, Go, count Israel from Beersheba and as far as Dan, and bring to me, that I may know their number.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:3
content: 3 And Joab said, May Yahweh add to his people like them 100 times. Are not, my lord the king, all of them servants to my lord? Why does my lord seek this? Why should it be guilt for Israel?

title: 1 Chronicles 21:4
content: 4 But the word of the king was strong against Joab. So Joab went out and walked back and forth in all Israel. Then he came to Jerusalem.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:5
content: 5 And Joab gave the number of the numbering of the people to David. And all Israel was 1,100,000 men who drew the sword, and Judah, 470,000 men who drew the sword.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:6
content: 6 But Levi and Benjamin he did not number in their midst, for the word of the king was abhorrent to Joab.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:7
content: 7 And it was evil in the eyes of God concerning this word, and he struck Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:8
content: 8 And David said to God, I have sinned greatly in that I have done this thing. And now please cause to pass the iniquity of your servant, for I have acted very foolishly.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:9
content: 9 And Yahweh spoke to Gad, the seer of David, saying,

title: 1 Chronicles 21:10
content: 10 Go and speak to David, saying, Thus says Yahweh, three I am stretching over you; choose for yourself one from them, and I will act towards you.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:11
content: 11 And Gad came to David, and he said to him, Thus says Yahweh, Take for yourself:

title: 1 Chronicles 21:12
content: 12 either three years famine, or three months being swept away from the faces of your foes and overtaken by the sword of your enemies, or three days of the sword of Yahweh, even pestilence in the land and the angel of Yahweh destroying in all the territory of Israel. And now, see; what word shall I bring back to the one who sent me?

title: 1 Chronicles 21:13
content: 13 And David said to Gad, There is great distress to me! Please let me fall into the hand of Yahweh, for many are his great mercies, but into the hand of man, do not let me fall.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:14
content: 14 And Yahweh gave a pestilence on Israel, and from Israel fell 70,000 men.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:15
content: 15 And God sent an angel to Jerusalem to destroy her. And when destroying, Yahweh saw, and he relented concerning the disaster. And he said to the angel who was destroying, Enough! Now release your hand. And the angel of Yahweh was standing at the threshing floor of Ornan the Jebusite.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:16
content: 16 And David lifted his eyes and saw the angel of Yahweh standing between the earth and between the heavens and his sword drawn in his hand stretched out over Jerusalem. And David fell, and the elders, covered in sackcloth, on their faces.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:17
content: 17 And David said to God, Was it not I myself who said to count the people? And it is I who sinned, and I have surely done evil, but these sheep, what have they done? Yahweh my God, please let your hand be against me and against the house of my father, but not on your people a plague.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:18
content: 18 And the angel of Yahweh said to Gad to say to David that David should go up to raise an altar to Yahweh at the threshing floor of Ornan the Jebusite.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:19
content: 19 So David went up at the word of Gad who spoke in the name of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:20
content: 20 And Ornan turned, and he saw the angel. And four of his sons with him were hiding themselves. And Ornan was threshing wheat.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:21
content: 21 And David came to Ornan. And Ornan looked, and he saw David. And he went out from the threshing floor, and he bowed down to David, face to the ground.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:22
content: 22 And David said to Ornan, Give to me the place of the threshing floor, and I will build on it an altar to Yahweh. At the full price give it to me, so the plague may be restrained from against the people.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:23
content: 23 And Ornan said to David, Take for yourself that my lord the king may do good in his eyes. See, I give the cattle for the burnt offerings and the threshing sledges for wood, and the wheat for the offering; all I give.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:24
content: 24 And King David said to Ornan, No, for I will surely buy at the full price, for I will not lift up what is yours to Yahweh and offer a burnt offering without paying compensation.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:25
content: 25 And David gave to Ornan for the place 600 shekels of gold by weight.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:26
content: 26 And David built there an altar to Yahweh and he offered burnt offerings and peace offerings. And he called to Yahweh, and he answered him with fire from the heavens on the altar of the burnt offering.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:27
content: 27 And Yahweh spoke to the angel, and he returned his sword to its sheath.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:28
content: 28 At that time, when David saw that Yahweh had answered him at the threshing floor of Ornan the Jebusite, then he sacrificed there.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:29
content: 29 And the tabernacle of Yahweh which Moses made in the wilderness and the altar of the burnt offering at that time were at the high place at Gibeon.

title: 1 Chronicles 21:30
content: 30 And David was not able to go to its face to seek God, for he was terrified from the faces of the sword of the angel of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:1
content: 1 And David said, This is the house of Yahweh God, and this is the altar for the burnt offering of Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:2
content: 2 And David said to gather the foreigners who were in the land of Israel. And he assigned stonemasons to hew out cut stones to build the house of God.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:3
content: 3 And a large amount of iron for the nails for the doors of the gates and for braces, David prepared; and a large amount of bronze, there is no weighing.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:4
content: 4 And trees of cedar without number, for the Sidonians and the Tyrians brought a large amount of cedar trees to David.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:5
content: 5 And David said, Solomon my son is young and tender, and the house to be built for Yahweh must be great for the sake of a name and for beauty in all the lands. I will now prepare for it. And David prepared a large amount before the face of his death.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:6
content: 6 And he called for Solomon his son, and he commanded him to build a house for Yahweh, the God of Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:7
content: 7 And David said to Solomon, My son, it was with my heart to build a house myself for the name of Yahweh my God.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:8
content: 8 But the word of Yahweh was to me, saying, A large amount of blood you have shed and great wars you have made; you shall not build a house for my name because a large amount of blood you have shed on the ground before my face.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:9
content: 9 Behold, a son is being born to you; he himself will be a man of rest. And I will give rest to him from all his enemies from all around. For Solomon will be his name, and peace and quietness I will give to Israel in his days.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:10
content: 10 He himself will build a house for my name. And he himself will be to me a son, and I to him a father. And I will establish the throne of his kingdom over Israel as far as forever.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:11
content: 11 Now, my son, may Yahweh be with you, and may you be successful and build a house of Yahweh your God, just as he spoke concerning you.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:12
content: 12 Only may Yahweh give to you insight and understanding, and give you charge over Israel so that you may keep the law of Yahweh your God.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:13
content: 13 Then you will succeed, if you are careful to do the statutes and the judgments which Yahweh commanded Moses concerning Israel. Be strong and courageous. Do not fear and do not be dismayed.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:14
content: 14 Now, see, in my affliction, I have prepared for the house of Yahweh gold talents, 100,000, and silver, 1,000,000 talents, and for bronze and for iron, there is no weighing, for there is a large amount. And trees and stones I have prepared. And to them you will add.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:15
content: 15 And with you is a large amount of doers of work: stonemasons, and craftsmen of stone and wood, and all wise in all work,

title: 1 Chronicles 22:16
content: 16 for gold, for silver, and for bronze, and for iron; there is no numbering. Arise and work. And may Yahweh be with you.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:17
content: 17 And David commanded all the chiefs of Israel to help Solomon his son,

title: 1 Chronicles 22:18
content: 18 Is not Yahweh your God with you all and given rest to you all from all around? For he has given into my hand the inhabitants of the land, and the land is subdued before the face of Yahweh and before the faces of his people.

title: 1 Chronicles 22:19
content: 19 Now, give your heart and your life to seek Yahweh your God, and arise and build the sanctuary of Yahweh God to bring the Box of the covenant of Yahweh and the sacred items of God to the house to be built for the name of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:1
content: 1 And David was old and was full of days, and he made Solomon his son king over Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:2
content: 2 And he gathered all the chiefs of Israel and the priests and the Levites.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:3
content: 3 And the Levites were counted from sons of 30 years and upward and the numbering was by their heads, by males, 38, 000.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:4
content: 4 From these, to lead the work of the house of Yahweh, 24,000, and officers and judges, 6,000,

title: 1 Chronicles 23:5
content: 5 and 4,000 gatekeepers and 4,000 praisers to Yahweh with the instruments which I made to praise.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:6
content: 6 And David divided them into divisions according to the sons of Levi: of Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:7
content: 7 Of the Gershonites: Ladan and Shimei.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:8
content: 8 The sons of Ladan: the head Jehiel, and Zetham, and Joel, three.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:9
content: 9 The sons of Shimei: Shelomoth, and Haziel, and Haran, three. These, the heads of the fathers of Ladan.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:10
content: 10 And the sons of Shimei: Jahath, and Zina, and Jeush, and Beriah. These, the sons of Shimei, four.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:11
content: 11 And Jahath was the head, and Zizah the second, but Jeush and Beriah did not have many sons, and they were to a house of a father for one group.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:12
content: 12 The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel, four.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:13
content: 13 The sons of Amram: Aaron and Moses. And Aaron was set apart for him to consecrate the most holy things, he and his sons until forever, to make sacrifices before the face of Yahweh to minister for him and to bless in his name until forever.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:14
content: 14 And Moses, the man of God, his sons were called according to the tribe of Levi.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:15
content: 15 The sons of Moses: Gershom and Eliezer.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:16
content: 16 The sons of Gershom: Shebuel the head.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:17
content: 17 And the sons of Eliezer were Rehabiah the head, and there were not to Eliezer other sons, but the sons of Rehabiah were many above that.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:18
content: 18 The sons of Izhar: Shelomith the head.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:19
content: 19 The sons of Hebron: Jeriah the head, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, and Jekameam the fourth.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:20
content: 20 The sons of Uzziel: Micah the head, and Isshiah the second.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:21
content: 21 The sons of Merari: Mahli and Mushi. The sons of Mahli: Eleazar and Kish.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:22
content: 22 And Eleazar died and there were not to him sons, but only daughters. And the sons of Kish, their brothers, lifted them.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:23
content: 23 The sons of Mushi: Mahli, and Eder, and Jerimoth, three.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:24
content: 24 These were the sons of Levi according to the house of their fathers, heads of the fathers, by their appointments, in the numbering of names by their heads, the doer of the work of the service of the house of Yahweh; from the sons of 20 years and upward.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:25
content: 25 For David said, Yahweh, the God of Israel, has given rest to his people. And he dwells in Jerusalem until forever.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:26
content: 26 And also, for the Levites, no longer to carry the tabernacle and all its items for its service.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:27
content: 27 For by the last words of David, they were numbering the sons of Levi, from the sons of 20 years and upward.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:28
content: 28 For their office was by the hand of the sons of Aaron for the service of the house of Yahweh over the courts, and over the chambers, and over the cleansing of all the sacred things, and the work of the service of the house of God.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:29
content: 29 And concerning the bread of the arrangement, and concerning the fine flour for the offering, and concerning the wafers of the unleavened bread, and concerning the pan, and concerning that which is mixed, and concerning all measure and size.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:30
content: 30 And to stand morning by morning to thank and to praise Yahweh, and thus in the evening.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:31
content: 31 And concerning to offer all the burnt offerings to Yahweh for the Sabbaths, for the new moons, and for the appointed times in the numbering according to the judgment over them regularly before the face of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 23:32
content: 32 And they were to keep the charge of the tent of meeting and the charge of the holy place, and the charge of the sons of Aaron their brothers for the service of the house of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:1
content: 1 And to the sons of Aaron, their division. The sons of Aaron: Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:2
content: 2 And Nadab died, as well as Abihu, before the face of their father, and sons were not to them. And Eleazar and Ithamar became priests.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:3
content: 3 And David divided them, along with Zadok from the sons of Eleazar, and Ahimelech from the sons of Ithamar, according to their office in their service.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:4
content: 4 And more sons of Eleazar were found for heads of men than the sons of Ithamar, and they divided them for the sons of Eleazar, heads of a house of the fathers, 16, and for the sons of Ithamar for the house of their fathers, eight.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:5
content: 5 And they divided them by lots, these with these, for there were sacred chiefs and chiefs of God from the sons of Eleazar and in the sons of Ithamar.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:6
content: 6 And Shemaiah the son of Nethanel the scribe from the Levites wrote them before the face of the king, and the chiefs, and Zadok the priest, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, and the heads of the fathers for the priests and for the Levites. One house of a father was picked for Eleazar, and one was picked for Ithamar.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:7
content: 7 And the first lot went to Jehoiarib, to Jedaiah the second,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:8
content: 8 to Harim the third, to Seorim the fourth,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:9
content: 9 to Malkijah the fifth, to Mijamin the sixth,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:10
content: 10 to Hakkoz the seventh, to Abijah the eighth,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:11
content: 11 to Jeshua the ninth, to Shecaniah the tenth,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:12
content: 12 to Eliashib the 11th, to Jakim the 12th,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:13
content: 13 to Huppah the 13th, to Jeshebeab the 14th,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:14
content: 14 to Bilgah the 15th, to Immer the 16th,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:15
content: 15 to Hezir the 17th, to Happizzez the 18th,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:16
content: 16 to Pethahiah the 19th, to Jehezkel the 20th,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:17
content: 17 to Jakin the 21st, to Gamul the 22nd,

title: 1 Chronicles 24:18
content: 18 to Delaiah the 23rd, to Maaziah the 24th.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:19
content: 19 These, their office for their service to come into the house of Yahweh, according to the judgments by the hand of Aaron their father, just as Yahweh the God of Israel commanded him.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:20
content: 20 And to the sons of Levi, the ones who are left, of the sons of Amram, Shubael; of the sons of Shubael, Jehdeiah.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:21
content: 21 To Rehabiah, of the sons of Rehabiah, the head Ishijah.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:22
content: 22 To the Izharites, Shelomoth, of the sons of Shelomoth, Jahath.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:23
content: 23 And the sons of Jeriah, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, and Jekameam the fourth.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:24
content: 24 The sons of Uzziel, Micah, of the sons of Micah, Shamir.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:25
content: 25 The brother of Micah, Ishijah, of the sons of Ishijah, Zechariah.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:26
content: 26 The sons of Merari: Mahli and Mushi. The sons of Jaaziah: Beno.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:27
content: 27 The sons of Merari, of Jaaziah: Beno, and Shoham, and Zaccur, and Ibri.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:28
content: 28 To Mahli, Eleazar, and not were to him sons.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:29
content: 29 To Kish, the sons of Kish, Jerahmeel.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:30
content: 30 And the sons of Mushi: Mahli, and Eder, and Jerimoth. These, the sons of the Levites, according to the house of their fathers.

title: 1 Chronicles 24:31
content: 31 And these also cast lots just like their brothers, the sons of Aaron, before the face of King David, along with Zadok and Ahimelech and the heads of the fathers, for the priests and for the Levites; the fathers of the head just like his younger brother.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:1
content: 1 And David and the chiefs of the army divided for the service for the sons of Asaph, and Heman, and Jeduthun, the ones prophesying with harps, with lyres, and with cymbals. And the numbering of the men of work for their service was:

title: 1 Chronicles 25:2
content: 2 Of the sons of Asaph: Zaccur, and Joseph, and Nethaniah, and Asharelah, the sons of Asaph, under the hand of Asaph, who was prophesying under the hands of the king.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:3
content: 3 Of Jeduthun, the sons of Jeduthun: Gedaliah, and Zeri, and Jeshaiah, Hashabiah, and Mattithiah, six, under the hands of their father Jeduthun, with the harp one prophesying, for giving thanks and to praise Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:4
content: 4 Of Heman, the sons of Heman: Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shubael, and Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, and Romamti-Ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, Mahazioth.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:5
content: 5 All these, the sons of Heman, the seer of the king by the words of God to lift up a horn. And God gave to Heman 14 sons and three daughters.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:6
content: 6 All these, under the hands of their father in the song of the house of Yahweh, with cymbals, harps, and lyres for the service of the house of God under the hands of the king: Asaph, and Jeduthun, and Heman.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:7
content: 7 And their numbering with their brothers who were taught the song of Yahweh, all the ones who understand, 288.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:8
content: 8 And they cast lots for a charge, small and great alike, one who understands with a student.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:9
content: 9 And the first lot went to Asaph, to Joseph; Gedaliah the second, he and his brothers and his sons, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:10
content: 10 The third Zaccur, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:11
content: 11 The fourth to Izri, his sons and his brothers, 12;

title: 1 Chronicles 25:12
content: 12 The fifth Nethaniah, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:13
content: 13 The sixth Bukkiah, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:14
content: 14 The seventh Jesarelah, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:15
content: 15 The eighth Jeshaiah, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:16
content: 16 The ninth Mattaniah, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:17
content: 17 The tenth Shimei, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:18
content: 18 The 11th Azarel, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:19
content: 19 The 12th to Hashabiah, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:20
content: 20 For the 13th Shubael, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:21
content: 21 For the 14th Mattithiah, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:22
content: 22 For the 15th to Jerimoth, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:23
content: 23 For the 16th to Hananiah, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:24
content: 24 For the 17th to Joshbekashah, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:25
content: 25 For the 18th to Hanani, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:26
content: 26 For the 19th to Mallothi, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:27
content: 27 For the 20th to Eliathah, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:28
content: 28 For the 21st to Hothir, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:29
content: 29 For the 22nd to Giddalti, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:30
content: 30 For the 23rd to Mahazioth, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 25:31
content: 31 For the 24th to Romamti-Ezer, his sons and his brothers, 12.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:1
content: 1 For the divisions of the gatekeepers: Of the Korahites, Meshelemiah the son of Kore, from the sons of Asaph.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:2
content: 2 And to Meshelemiah sons: Zechariah the firstborn, Jediael the second, Zebadiah the third, Jathniel the fourth,

title: 1 Chronicles 26:3
content: 3 Elam the fifth, Jehohanan the sixth, Eliehoenai the seventh.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:4
content: 4 And to Obed Edom sons: Shemaiah the firstborn, Jehozabad the second, Joah the third, and Sakar the fourth, and Nethanel the fifth,

title: 1 Chronicles 26:5
content: 5 Ammiel the sixth, Issachar the seventh, Peullethai the eighth, for God blessed him.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:6
content: 6 And to Shemaiah his son were born sons, rulers in the house of their fathers; for mighty ones of strength they were.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:7
content: 7 The sons of Shemaiah: Othni, and Rephael, and Obed, Elzabad his brothers, sons of strength, Elihu and Semakiah.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:8
content: 8 All these from the sons of Obed Edom. They and their sons and their brothers, men of strength with power for service, 62 of Obed Edom.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:9
content: 9 And to Meshelemiah sons and brothers, sons of strength, 18.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:10
content: 10 And to Hosah, from the sons of Merari, sons: Shimri the head, although he was not firstborn, and his father set him as head,

title: 1 Chronicles 26:11
content: 11 Hilkiah the second, Tabaliah the third, Zechariah the fourth. All the sons and brothers to Hosah, 13.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:12
content: 12 To these divisions of the gatekeepers, to the head males a charge just like their brothers to minister in the house of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:13
content: 13 And they cast lots, like small like great, according to the house of their fathers for gate and gate.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:14
content: 14 And the lot fell to the east, to Shelemiah and Zechariah his son, an advisor with insight. And they cast lots and his lot went to the north.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:15
content: 15 To Obed Edom to the south, and to his sons, the house of stores.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:16
content: 16 To Shuppim and to Hosah, to the west with the gate of Shalleketh on the road that goes up; a guard alongside a guard.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:17
content: 17 To the east six Levites, to the north per day four, to the south per day four, and to the stores two by two.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:18
content: 18 At the colonnade to the west, four at the highway, two at the colonnade.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:19
content: 19 These, the divisions of the gatekeepers for the sons of the Korahites and for the sons of Merari.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:20
content: 20 And the Levites, Ahijah over the treasuries of the house of God and of the treasuries of the sacred things.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:21
content: 21 The sons of Ladan, the sons of the Gershonites belonging to Ladan, the heads of the fathers, belonging to Ladan the Gershonite, Jehieli.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:22
content: 22 The sons of Jehieli: Zetham and Joel his brother, over the treasuries of the house of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:23
content: 23 Of the Amramites, of the Izharites, of the Hebronites, of the Uzzielites:

title: 1 Chronicles 26:24
content: 24 And Shubael the son of Gershom, the son of Moses, a leader over the treasuries,

title: 1 Chronicles 26:25
content: 25 and his brothers; to Eliezer, Rehabiah his son, and Jeshaiah his son, and Joram his son, and Zichri his son, and Shelomith his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:26
content: 26 This Shelomith and his brothers were over all the treasuries of the sacred things which David the king consecrated, and the heads of the fathers, of the chiefs of thousands and hundreds, and the chiefs of the army.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:27
content: 27 From battles and from plunder they consecrated to strengthen the house of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:28
content: 28 And all Samuel the seer consecrated, and Saul the son of Kish, and Abner the son of Ner, and Joab the son of Zeruiah. All the sacred things were under the hand of Shelomith and his brothers.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:29
content: 29 Of the Izharites, Kenaniah and his sons to the work of the outside for Israel as officers and judges.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:30
content: 30 Of the Hebronites, Hashabiah and his brothers, sons of strength, 1,700, over appointment of Israel from beyond the Jordan to the west for all the work of Yahweh and for the service of the king.

title: 1 Chronicles 26:31
content: 31 Of the Hebronites, Jeriah the head of the Hebronites according to his generations of fathers. In the 40th year of the reign of David they were sought out and there were found among them mighty ones of strength in Jazer of Gilead,

title: 1 Chronicles 26:32
content: 32 and his brothers, sons of strength, 2,700 heads of the fathers. And David the king appointed them over the Reubenites and the Gadites and the half tribe of Manasseh, for every matter of God, and matter of the king.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:1
content: 1 And the sons of Israel, for the numbering of the heads of the fathers and the chiefs of thousands and hundreds, and their officers of those who minister to the king for any matter of the divisions who come and go month by month for all months of the year, one division, 24, 000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:2
content: 2 Over the first division for the first month, Jashobeam the son of Zabdiel, and over his division, 24, 000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:3
content: 3 From the sons of Perez the head of all the chiefs of the armies for the first month.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:4
content: 4 And over the division for the second month, Dodai the Ahohite and his division, and Mikloth the leader, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:5
content: 5 The third chief of the army for the third month, Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the head priest, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:6
content: 6 This Benaiah the mighty one of the 30, and over the 30 and his division, Ammizabad his son.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:7
content: 7 The fourth for the fourth month, Asahel brother of Joab and Zebadiah his son after him, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:8
content: 8 The fifth for the fifth month, the chief Shamhuth the Izrahite, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:9
content: 9 The sixth for the sixth month, Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:10
content: 10 The seventh for the seventh month, Helez the Pelonite, from the sons of Ephraim, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:11
content: 11 The eighth for the eighth month, Sibbekai the Hushathite, of the Zerahites, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:12
content: 12 The ninth for the ninth month, Abiezer the Anathothite, of the Benjaminites, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:13
content: 13 The tenth for the tenth month, Maharai the Netophahite, of the Zerahites, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:14
content: 14 The 11th for the 11th month, Benaiah the Pirathonite, from the sons of Ephraim, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:15
content: 15 The 12th for the 12th month, Heldai the Netophahite, of Othniel, and over his division, 24,000.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:16
content: 16 And over the tribes of Israel: for the Reubenites, a leader, Eliezer the son of Zichri; for the Simeonites, Shephatiah the son of Maacah;

title: 1 Chronicles 27:17
content: 17 for the Levites, Hashabiah the son of Kemuel; for Aaron, Zadok;

title: 1 Chronicles 27:18
content: 18 for Judah, Elihu, from the brothers of David; for Issachar, Omri the son of Michael;

title: 1 Chronicles 27:19
content: 19 for Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah; for Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel;

title: 1 Chronicles 27:20
content: 20 for the sons of Ephraim, Hoshea the son of Azaziah; for the half tribe of Manasseh, Joel the son of Pedaiah;

title: 1 Chronicles 27:21
content: 21 for the half of Manasseh in Gilead, Iddo the son of Zechariah; for Benjamin, Jaasiel the son of Abner;

title: 1 Chronicles 27:22
content: 22 for Dan, Azarel the son of Jeroham. These, the chiefs of the tribes of Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:23
content: 23 And David did not lift the numbering for sons of 20 years and downwards, because Yahweh said he would multiply Israel like the stars of the heavens.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:24
content: 24 Joab the son of Zeruiah began to count, but he did not finish. And there was among this wrath on Israel. And the number did not go up into the number of the matters of the days of King David.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:25
content: 25 And over the treasuries of the king, Azmaveth the son of Adiel. And over the treasuries in the field, in the cities, and in the villages, and in the towers, Jonathan the son of Uzziah.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:26
content: 26 And over the ones who do the work of the field, for the service of the ground, Ezri the son of Kelub.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:27
content: 27 And over the vineyards, Shimei the Ramathite. And over what is in the vineyards for the treasuries of the wine, Zabdi the Shiphmite.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:28
content: 28 And over the olive trees and the sycamore trees which were in the lowlands, Baal-Hanan the Gederite. And over the treasuries of the oil, Joash.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:29
content: 29 And over the herd pasturing in Sharon, Shitrai the Sharonite. And over the herd in the valleys, Shaphat the son of Adlai.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:30
content: 30 And over the camels, Obil the Ishmaelite. And over the female donkeys, Jehdeiah the Meronothite.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:31
content: 31 And over the flock, Jaziz the Hagrite. All these, the chiefs of the property which belonged to King David.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:32
content: 32 And Jonathan, the uncle of David, an advisor, a man of understanding and a scribe, was he. And Jehiel the son of Hakmoni was with the sons of the king.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:33
content: 33 And Ahithophel, an advisor to the king, and Hushai the Arkite, friend to the king.

title: 1 Chronicles 27:34
content: 34 And after Ahithophel, Jehoiada the son of Benaiah and Abiathar. And the chief of the army of the king, Joab.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:1
content: 1 And David called to assembly all the chiefs of Israel: the chiefs of the tribes, and the chiefs of the divisions who served the king, and the chiefs of the thousands, and the chiefs of the hundreds, and the chiefs of all the property and cattle belonging to the king and to his sons, with the high officials, and the mighty ones, and to all the mighty ones of strength, to Jerusalem.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:2
content: 2 And David the king rose to his feet, and he said, Hear me, my brothers and my people, I had in my heart to build a house of rest for the Box of the covenant of Yahweh and for the footstool of the feet of our God. And I have prepared to build.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:3
content: 3 But God said to me, You will not build a house for my name, because a man of war you are and blood you have shed.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:4
content: 4 Yet Yahweh, the God of Israel, chose me from all of the house of my father to be king over Israel forever, for among Judah he chose for a leader, and in the house of Judah, the house of my father, and among the sons of my father, with me he was pleased to make king over all Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:5
content: 5 And from all my sons, for many sons Yahweh has given to me, and he chose Solomon my son to sit on the throne of the kingdom of Yahweh over Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:6
content: 6 And he said to me, Solomon your son, he himself will build my house and my courts, for I have chosen him for myself for a son, and I myself will be to him for a father.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:7
content: 7 And I will establish his kingdom until forever, if he is strong to do my commands and my judgments, like this day.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:8
content: 8 And now, in the eyes of all Israel, the assembly of Yahweh, and in the ears of our God, keep and seek all the commands of Yahweh your God in order that you all will possess the good land and you all will cause your sons after you to inherit until forever.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:9
content: 9 And you, Solomon my son, know the God of your father, and serve him with a whole heart and with a willing life, for all hearts Yahweh seeks and all purpose of thoughts understands. If you seek him, he will be found by you, but if you abandon him, he will reject you forever.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:10
content: 10 See, now, that Yahweh has chosen you to build a house for the sanctuary. Be strong and act.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:11
content: 11 And David gave to Solomon his son the plan of the porch, and its houses, and its treasuries, and its upper rooms, and its inner rooms, and the house of the atonement lid,

title: 1 Chronicles 28:12
content: 12 and the plan of all that was by the Spirit with him for the courts of the house of Yahweh, and for all the chambers all around, for the treasuries of the house of God and for the treasuries of the sacred things,

title: 1 Chronicles 28:13
content: 13 and for the divisions of the priests and the Levites, and for all the work of the service of the house of Yahweh, and for all the items of the service of the house of Yahweh,

title: 1 Chronicles 28:14
content: 14 for gold by weight, for gold for all the items of service and service, for all the items of silver by weight, for all the items of service and service,

title: 1 Chronicles 28:15
content: 15 and the weight for the gold lampstands and their gold lamps by weight of lampstand and lampstand and its lamps, and for the lampstands of silver by weight for the lampstand and its lamps, according to the service of lampstand and lampstand,

title: 1 Chronicles 28:16
content: 16 and the gold weight for the tables of the arrangement, for the table and table, and silver for the tables of silver,

title: 1 Chronicles 28:17
content: 17 and the forks and the bowls and the jugs of pure gold and for the basins of gold by weight for basin and basin, and for the basins of silver by weight, for basin and basin,

title: 1 Chronicles 28:18
content: 18 and for the altar of incense, refined gold by weight, and for the plan of the chariot of the cherubim, gold, that spread out and cover over the Box of the covenant of Yahweh.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:19
content: 19 The entirety in writing from the hand of Yahweh upon me, he instructed all of the works of the plan.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:20
content: 20 And David said to Solomon his son, Be strong and be courageous and act. Do not fear and do not be dismayed for Yahweh God, my God, is with you. He will not leave you and he will not abandon you until all the work of the service of the house of Yahweh is finished.

title: 1 Chronicles 28:21
content: 21 And behold, the divisions of the priests and the Levites for all the service of the house of God, and with you in all the work will be every willing one with wisdom, for all the service, and the chiefs and all the people for all your ways.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:1
content: 1 And King David said to all the assembly, Solomon my son, alone God has chosen him, is young and tender, and the work is great; for not for man is the palace but for Yahweh God.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:2
content: 2 And according to all my power I have provided for the house of my God, the gold for the gold, and the silver for the silver, and the bronze for the bronze, the iron for the iron, and the wood for the wood, stones of onyx and settings, stones of antimony and colorful things, and all the rare stones and alabaster stones, in abundance.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:3
content: 3 And again, in my delighting in the house of my God, possessions belonging to me, gold and silver, I give to the house of my God, above all I have prepared for the sacred house:

title: 1 Chronicles 29:4
content: 4 3,000 talents of gold from the gold of Ophir, and 7,000 talents of refined silver, to overlay the walls of the houses,

title: 1 Chronicles 29:5
content: 5 gold for gold, and silver for silver, and for all the work by the hand of the craftsmen. And who offers freely to fill his hand today to Yahweh?

title: 1 Chronicles 29:6
content: 6 And the chiefs of the fathers offered freely as well as the chiefs of the tribes of Israel and the chiefs of thousands and hundreds, and the chiefs of the work of the king.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:7
content: 7 And they gave for the service of the house of God gold, 5,000 talents and 10,000 darics, and silver, 10,000 talents, and bronze, 18,000 talents, and iron, 100,000 talents.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:8
content: 8 And he who was found with it, stones, they gave to the treasury of the house of Yahweh, under the hand of Jehiel the Gershonite.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:9
content: 9 And the people rejoiced because they offered freely, for with a whole heart they offered freely to Yahweh. And also King David rejoiced with great joy.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:10
content: 10 And David blessed Yahweh in the eyes of all the assembly. And David said, Blessed are you, Yahweh, God of Israel, our father, from forever and until forever.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:11
content: 11 To you, Yahweh, the greatness, and the might, and the beauty, and the splendor, and the majesty; indeed, everything in the heavens and in the earth. To you, Yahweh, the kingdom and lifting yourself above all as head.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:12
content: 12 And the riches and the glory from before your face, and you are ruling over all, and in your hand power and might, and in your hand to make great and to strengthen all.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:13
content: 13 And now, our God, we are giving thanks to you and praising the name of your beauty.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:14
content: 14 But who am I, and who are my people, that we should retain power to offer freely like this? For from you is everything, and from your hand we have given to you.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:15
content: 15 For we are foreigners before your face and sojourners, like all our fathers, like the shadow are our days on the earth, and there is no hope.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:16
content: 16 Yahweh our God, all this abundance that we have prepared in order to build for you a house for the name of your holiness, from your hand it is and for you is all.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:17
content: 17 And I know, my God, that you examine the heart and in uprightness are pleased. I, in the uprightness of my heart, I have offered freely all these, and now your people are found here, I see with joy, to offer freely to you.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:18
content: 18 Yahweh, the God of Abraham, Isaac, and Israelour fatherskeep this forever concerning the purpose of the thoughts of the heart of your people, and direct their hearts to you.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:19
content: 19 And to Solomon my son, give a whole heart to keep your commandments, your testimonies, and your statutes, and to do all and to build the palace for which I have prepared.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:20
content: 20 And David said to all the assembly, Bless Yahweh your God. And all the assembly blessed Yahweh, the God of their fathers. And they bowed down and paid homage to Yahweh and to the king.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:21
content: 21 And they sacrificed to Yahweh sacrifices, and they offered burnt offerings to Yahweh on the day following that day, 1,000 bulls, 1,000 rams, 1,000 lambs, and their drink offerings and sacrifices in abundance for all Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:22
content: 22 And they ate and drank before the face of Yahweh that day with great joy. And they made king a second time Solomon, the son of David, and they anointed for Yahweh for a leader and Zadok for priest.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:23
content: 23 And Solomon sat on the throne of Yahweh as king instead of David his father, and he succeeded. And all Israel listened to him.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:24
content: 24 And all the chiefs, and the mighty ones, and also all the sons of King David gave a hand under King Solomon.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:25
content: 25 And Yahweh made Solomon exceedingly great in the eyes of all Israel. And he bestowed on him majesty of a kingdom which has not been on any king before his face over Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:26
content: 26 And David the son of Jesse reigned over all Israel.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:27
content: 27 And the days which he reigned over Israel, 40 years. In Hebron he reigned seven years, and in Jerusalem he reigned 33.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:28
content: 28 And he died at a good old age, full of days, riches, and glory. And Solomon his son reigned in his place.

title: 1 Chronicles 29:29
content: 29 And the matters of King David, the first things and the last things, behold, they are written in the words of Samuel the Seer, and in the words of Nathan the prophet, and in the words of Gad the prophet,

title: 1 Chronicles 29:30
content: 30 with all his reign and his might and the times which passed over on him, and on Israel, and on all the kingdoms of the lands.
